yoruba: Bàbá àgbà Michael Obi, pẹ̀lú awakọ̀ rẹ̀ ni àwọn agbébọn tí a kò mọ̀ jígbé ní ọjọ́ kọkàndínlọ́gbọ̀ oṣù kẹfà, ní ó ku wákàtí díẹ̀ sí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìfe ẹ̀yẹ́ agbááyé orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà àti orílẹ̀-èdè ní St. Petersburg, ní orílẹ̀-èdè Russia.

english: But he was rescued by men of the Enugu state police command on Monday, who engaged the kidnappers in a gun battle.
yoruba: Ṣùgbọ́n àwọn ikọ̀ Ọlọ́pàá ẹ̀ka ti ìpínlẹ̀ Enúgun dóòlà rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ ajé (Monday), láwọn tí wọ́n dáná ogun ìbọn yá àwọn ajínigbé wọ̀nyí.

english: “I would like to thank the police authorities involved in ensuring the safe return of my father after the ordeal of this week,” Mikel said via his tweeter account.
yoruba: “Mà á fẹ́ dúpẹ́ lọ́wọ́ àwọn aláṣẹ ile-iṣẹ́ ọlọ́pàá tí wọ́n lọ́wọ́ nínú ìpadàbọ̀ bàbá mi láyọ̀ àti àlááfíà lẹ́yìn ìninilára ọ̀sẹ̀ yìí,” Mikel sọ èyí lórí ìkànnì Twitter rẹ̀.

english: He also thanked Nigerians for their prayers, as well as support.
yoruba: Ó tún dúpẹ́ lówọ́ àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà fún àdúrà àti àtìlẹyìn wọn.

english: “My family and i are grateful,” he concluded.
yoruba: “Èmi àti àwọn ẹbí mi mọ rírì o,” ló fi parí ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀

english: Despite this, Mikel went ahead to play the match without telling anyone of his predicament.
yoruba: Pẹ̀ú èyí, Mikel lọ láti gbá ìdíje náà láìsọ ohun tí ó ń bá a fínra fún ẹnikẹ́ni.

english: This would mark the second time in seven years that Pa Michael Obi has been kidnapped.
yoruba: Èyí ni ó fi jẹ́ ìgbà kejì láàrin ọdún méje tí Bàbá àgbà Michael Obi ti di jíjígbé.

english: Mohamed Salah signs new contract with Liverpool
yoruba: Mohamed Salah to̩wó̩ bò̩wé tuntun pẹ̀lú Liverpool.

english: Egyptian international Mohamed Salah’s stunning first season with English Premier League side Liverpool earned him a long-term contract with the club on Monday.
yoruba: Atamátàsé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Liverpool, tí ó tún jẹ́ ọmọ orílẹ̀ èdè Egypt, Mohamed Salah ti sún ìbásiṣẹ́pọ̀ rẹ̀ síwáju nínú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Liverpool.

english: The Egypt forward has committed his future to the Reds by putting pen to paper on the deal, a little over one year after originally arriving at Anfield from AS Roma,”.
yoruba: Agbábó̩ò̩lù iwájú fún orílè èdè Egypt tí sún àkókò rè̩ pè̩lú ikò̩ Liverpool síwájú si nípa títo̩wó̩ bò̩wé, lé̩yìn bi o̩dún kan tí ó ti ikò̩ AS Roma dé ikò̩ Liverpool.

english: Video: Watch Russian players celebrate after knocking out Spain
yoruba: Fídíò: Russia fìdùnnú hàn lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n já Spain.

english: Nobody gave the Russian football team any chance of making it out of the group stage.
yoruba: Ọ̀pọ̀ ènìyàn kò lérò pé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀ èdè Russia yóò ní àǹfààní láti jáde kúrò nípele kínní ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbáyé tó ń lọ lọ́wọ́, eléyìí tí orílẹ̀-èdè Russia ọ̀hún ṣagbátẹrù rẹ̀.

english: But they have defied all skeptics by knocking out Spain in the second round via penalties.
yoruba: Àmó̩, ikọ̀ ọ̀hún ya gbogbo ènìyàn lé̩nu nípa jíjá Spain nípele kejì ìdíje pẹ̀lú bọ́ọ̀lù àgbésílẹ̀-gbá.

english: IHF to train Nigerian handball coaches
yoruba: IHF yóò ṣèdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ fún àkọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá bò̩ó̩lù-àfo̩wó̩gbá wa.

english: President of Handball Federation of Nigeria Sam Ocheho has said plans are going on with the International Handball Federation to train the country’s handball coaches.
yoruba: Ààrẹ àjọ amójútó bọ́ọ̀lù-àfọwọ́gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà, Sam Ocheho sọ pé ètò ń lọ lọ́wọ́ pẹ̀lú àjọ amójútó bọ́ọ̀lù-àfọwọ́gbà tìlú òkèrè láti dáwo̩n akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá wa lé̩kò̩ó̩.

english: Ocheho, who disclosed this in Lagos during the recently-concluded Sam Ocheho International Invitational Handball Championships, said the federation is determined to improve the skills of coaches as well as the technical officials in the sport.
yoruba: Ocheho, sọ ọ̀rọ̀ yìí dí mímọ̀ ní àsìkò àsekágbá ìdíje Sam Ocheho International Invitational Handball Championships, ní àjo̩ ò̩hún ti pinnu láti mu ìmò̩ àwo̩n akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá wa àti àwo̩n òs̩ìs̩é̩ ìdárayá yòókù peléke sí i.

english: The HFN boss said the training would hold in Lagos, adding that the female national team would be in camp for two weeks to keep tabs and evaluate the progress of the players ahead of the future competitions.
yoruba: Ó fikún ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ pé, orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ti ṣetán láti mú àyípadà ọ̀tún dé bá eré ìdárayá ọ̀hún àti àwọn akónimọ̀ọ́gbá rẹ̀ lórílẹ̀-èdè yìí, tesiwaju si, Ocheho ní, ìdanilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ náà yóò wáyé ní ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ikọ̀ obìnrin yóò wà ní ìpàgọ́ wọn fún ọ̀sẹ̀ méjì, ní ọ̀nà láti tún máa ṣàmójútó àwọn olùkópa ṣaájú ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan ìdíje tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà.

english: He said "We are currently in talks with the IHF to help us train and develop our coaches".
yoruba: O ní, báyìí, ọ̀rò̩ ń lọ lọ́wọ́ pẹ̀lú àjọ IHF láti ràn wá lọ́wọ́ fún ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá wa gbogbo.

english: The training will come up before the end of the year because we need our coaches to have the latest knowledge in the sport which will impact on the players as well.
yoruba: Ìdánilẹ́kọ̀ọ́ náà yóò wáyé kí ọdún yìí tó parí, nítorí a fẹ́ kí àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá wa ní ìmọ̀ ló̩wó̩ló̩wó̩ nínú eré ìdárayá náà, èyí tí á nípa lórí àwo̩n agbábò̩ò̩lù.

english: World Cup: Belgium beats England 1-0
yoruba: Ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé: Belgium lu England.

english: Adnan Januzaj fired Belgium into the lead in this World Cup Group G decider.
yoruba: Àmì-ayò kan ṣoṣo Adnan Januzaj ló mú ikò̩ Belgium je̩gàba lórí England ikò̩ G.

english: The former Manchester United man curled the ball into the top corner from the edge of the area, ensuring Belgium look set for top spot in the group unless England find an equaliser.
yoruba: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù tẹ́lẹ̀rí Manchester United gbámì-ayò náà wọlé níṣẹ̀ẹ́jú péréte kí ìfẹ́sẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún tó wá síparí, èyí tó sì mú ikò̩ Belgium lé tété níkò̩ wo̩n àfi tíkò̩ England bá mi àwò̩n bákan náà.

english: Both sides, already qualified for the knockout stages, have made wholesale changes to their sides and neither looked especially keen to push on for victory.
yoruba: È̩wè̩, látàarí pípegedé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílè̩-èdè méjéèjì, oríṣiríṣi àtúnṣe nikọ̀ kọ̀ọ̀kan ṣe, èyí  ó sì han bóyá ikò̩ yòówù fé̩ jáwé olúborí nínú ìfe̩sè̩wo̩nsè̩ wo̩n.

english: Belgium have picked up two yellow cards, meaning they have five for the tournament compared to England’s two.
yoruba: Belgium ti gba àpapọ̀ káàdì pélébé ólómi ọsàn márùn-ún tí orílẹ̀ èdè England sì ti gba méjì péré.

english: That means that if the game finishes a draw, England will top the group on the fair play method if the scores remain level at the full-time whistle.
yoruba: Èyí tó jásí pé, tí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún bá parí sámì dọ́gba-dọ́gba, England yóò parí sípò kinni ṣaájú ikọ̀ akẹegbẹ́ wọn tí wo̩n kò bá mi àwò̩n ara wo̩n.

english: NFF celebrates Rohr, Balogun as they mark their birthdays
yoruba: Àjọ NFF sàjọyọ̀ ayẹyẹ ọjọ́-ìbí pẹ̀lú Rohr àti Balogun.

english: The Nigeria Football Federation (NFF) has congratulated Coach Gernot Rohr who marked his 65th birthday in Essentuki, Russia on Thursday.
yoruba: Àjọ amójútó bọ́ọ̀lù ní Nàìjííríà (NFF), sàjọyọ̀ ọjọ́-ìbí pẹ̀lú akó̩nimò̩ó̩gbá, Gernot Rohr, tó s̩ayẹyẹ ọjọ́-ìbí ọdún márùndínláàdọ́rin lEssentuki, Russia lọ́jọ́bọ.

english: Rohr was born on June 28, 1953 in Mannheim, Germany.
yoruba: Wọ́n bí Rohr lọ́jọ́ kéjídínlọ́gbọ̀n oṣù kẹfà, ọdún 1953 ni Mannheim, Germany.

english: The former OGC Nice manager was appointed head coach of the Super Eagles in 2016 and he steered the team to qualify for the 2018 FIFA World Cup in Russia.
yoruba: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá OGC Nice té̩lè̩, lạ̀jọ NFF yàn gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọnimọ̀ọ́gbá Super Eagles lọ́dún 2016 ó sì rankọ̀ ọ̀hún lọ́wọ́ láti lo̩ ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé tó ń lọ lọ́wọ́ lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.

english: Rohr’s contract was extended by the NFF till 2020.
yoruba: NFF sún ìbáṣiṣẹ́pọ̀ pẹ̀lú Rohr síwájú di ọdún 2020.

english: “Happy birthday to Super Eagles Coach Gernot Rohr.
yoruba: Kú ayẹyẹ ọjọ́-ibi akó̩nimò̩ó̩gbá Super Eagles, Gernot Rohr.

english: “The staff at the Essentuki Team Base Camp offered him a cake and bouquet of flowers to celebrate his day,” the NFF tweeted, with a picture of a celebrating Rohr surrounded by staff of the base camp.
yoruba: “Àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ tí wọ́n jọ ń ṣiṣẹ́ pò ní ìpàgọ́ ikọ̀ ọ̀hún nílùú Essentuki, pèsè àkàrà òyìnbó àti òdòdó láti fi ṣàjọyọ̀ o̩jó̩ rẹ̀,” NFF sò̩yí lóri twitter, pè̩lú àwò̩rán Rohr tó dunnú táwo̩n òs̩ìs̩é̩ sì yiká.

english: Rohr has been in charge of the Super Eagles for 20 games, winning nine, losing six and drawing five.
yoruba: Rohr atùkọ̀ Super Eagles gbá ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ogún, ó borí mẹ́sàn-án, ó pàdánù mẹ́fà, ó sì gbá ò̩mì márùn ún.

english: The NFF also wished Super Eagles defender Leon Balogun who turned 30 years today (Thursday) a Happy birthday.
yoruba: Àjọ NFF tún kí agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yìn ikọ̀ Super Eagles, Leon Balogun tí ó pé ogbọ̀n ọdún lọ́jọ́bọ̀ (Thursday).

english: Balogun, a German-Nigerian defender was born on June 28, 1988 in Berlin Germany.
yoruba: Wọ́n bí Balogun lọ́jọ́ kéjídínlọ́gbọ̀n oṣu ̀kẹfà, ọdún 1988 sílùu Berlin, lórílẹ̀-èdè Germany.

english: You’re our pride – CAF, FIFA scribe salute gallant Eagles
yoruba: Amúyangàn wá niyín - CAF, FIFA gbóríyìn fún Super Eagles.

english: FIFA Secretary General Fatma Samoura, the Confederation of Africa Football (CAF) and some Nigerians believe Super Eagles made the continent proud despite their World Cup ouster.
yoruba: Akọ̀wé àgbà àjọ FIFA, Fatma Samoura, àjọ CAF àti ọ̀gọ̀ọ̀rò̩ àwọn olólùfẹ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù ló gbà pé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles mú ilè̩ adúláwò̩ dùn pè̩lú bí wó̩n se pàdánù ìfe̩sè̩wo̩nsè̩ wo̩n.

english: A 1-0 loss to Argentina in the last group D game at Saint Petersburg stadium sent the team to a third place with three points behind their South American counterparts with four points.
yoruba: Àmì-ayò kan sódo ni ikò̩ Argentina ni ìfe̩sèwo̩nsè̩ ikò̩ ìke̩yìn (Group D) ni pápá ìs̩iré Saint Petersburg, èyí tó mú wo̩n wà nípò ke̩ta pè̩lú àmì mé̩ta lé̩yìn Argentina tó mí àmì mé̩rin.

english: Lionel Messi’s captained side will join group leaders Croatia with nine points in the knockout stages while debutants Iceland will head home with a point alongside Gernot Rohr tutored side.
yoruba: Argentina tí Lionel Messi jé̩ balógun wo̩n, yóò darapọ̀ mọ́ Croatia tó parí ìfigagbága ọ̀hún sípò kínní pẹ̀lú àmì mẹ́sàn-án, nígbà tí Iceland às̩è̩s̩è̩dé yóò lo̩lé pè̩lú ikò̩ Gernot Rohr.

english: You have not only lifted the spirits of your country but the Super Eagles made them very proud of you,” she tweeted.
yoruba: Bákan náà, àjọ CAF, ti adúláwò̩, sọ lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára wọn pé, ikọ̀ Super Eagles gbìyànjú lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni wọ́n mú orí àwọn wú.

english: Some Nigerian politicians also took to  their twitter handles to laud the team.
yoruba: Àwo̩n olós̩èlú kan ní Nàìjíríà fi so̩wó̩ lórí twitter láti yìn ikò̩ Nàìjíríà.

english: Senate President Bukola Saraki tweeted: ” A great performance by our Super Eagles.
yoruba: Ààrẹ ilé ìgbìmọ̀ aṣòfin, Dókítà Bukola Saraki túwíìtì pé: Iṣẹ́ takun-takun ni ikọ̀ Super Eagles ṣe.

english: We fought a good fight.
yoruba: A sa ipa púpọ̀.

english: However, you win some, you lose some.
yoruba: Síbè̩, ènìyàn borí níwò̩n, kùnà níwò̩n.

english: Raise your heads up, you inspired all 180 million of us. Thank you”.
yoruba: E̩ s̩o̩kàn o̩kùnrin, nítorí e̩ dàwò̩ko̩s̩e fún o̩gó̩sàn-án mílíò̩nù. E s̩eun”.

english: Senator Ben Murray Bruce tweeted: “Great game @NGSuperEagles.
yoruba: "Aṣòfin Ben Murray Bruce ní: Iṣẹ́ ribiribi lẹ ṣe.

english: The score line doesn’t fluctuate the position of our hearts.
yoruba: Èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ yìí kò yí ìfẹ́ yín lọ́kàn wa padà.

english: We won together, we lost together. We remain proud of you guys”.
yoruba: A jo̩ borí papò̩, a jo̩ kùnà papò̩. E s̩e múyangàn.

english: With Egypt, Morocco and Tunisia out of the World Cup, Senegal, the only African nation left,  will take on Columbia in their last group H game on Thursday.
yoruba: Pè̩lú Egypt, Morocco àti Tunisia tí wó̩n ti lo̩lé, Senegal nìkan lorílè̩èdè adúláwò̩ kan tó kù, wo̩n á fe̩sè̩wo̩nsè̩ pè̩lú Colombia ni ìfe̩sè̩wo̩nsè̩ tó ké̩yìn ikò̩ H ló̩jó̩bò̩.

english: Croatia drops key players
yoruba: Croatia yóò gbé àwọn ojúlówó agbábọ́ọ̀lù jókòó.

english: Croatia coach Zlatko Dalic is set to rest up to eight players for their Russia 2018 World Cup final Group D game with Iceland.
yoruba: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikò̩ Croatia, Zlatko Dalic s̩etán láti gbé àwọn ojúlówó agbábọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́jọ jókòó nínú ìfigagbága ìkẹyìn ìpele àkọ́kọ́ ìdíje Russia pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀-èdè Iceland.

english: Dalic’s side are already through to the next round and are expected to rest Ivan Rakitic, Mario Mandzukic, Luka Modric, Dejan Lovren and Ante Rabic and other players at risk of suspension for the knock-out stage.
yoruba: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ikò̩ Dalic tí ní àmì tí ó ye̩ fún ìpele tó tè̩le ní ìdíje̩ ò̩hún, ìrètí wà pé, Ivan Rakitic, Mario Mandzukic, Luka Modric, Dejan Lovren àti Ante Rabic wọn kò ní bẹ̀rẹ̀ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náa.

english: “I’d like to top the group, but we have to take care because we have some players on yellow cards, so I will change the line-up,” said Dalic during his pre-match press conference.
yoruba: Dalic ní, Ó wù mí láti wà lókè téńté tábìlì, s̩ùgbó̩n a gbọdọ̀ ṣe àtúnṣe síkọ̀ wa, látàrí àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù kọ̀ọ̀kan tó ti gba káàdì olómi-ọsàn, fúndìí èyí màá sàtúnṣe sáwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lu mì.

english: Saudi Arabia beats Egypt 2-1
yoruba: Saudi Arabia fàgbà han Egypt pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò méjì sóókan.

english: Egypt also gave 45 year-old keeper Essam El-Hadary a chance to become the oldest ever player to appear at a World Cup
yoruba: Egypt fún ọmọ ọdún márùndínláàdọ́ta aṣọ́lé wo̩n, Essam El-Hadary láǹfààní láti dile, èyí tó sọ́ daṣọ́lé tó dàgbà jùlọ nítàn bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé.

english: Both Egypt and Saudi Arabia lost their first two games
yoruba: Egypt àti Saudi Arabia ló pàdánù ìfe̩sè̩wo̩nsè̩ méjì wo̩n àkó̩kó̩.

english: Al Dawsari scores the winner as Saudi Arabia finish third in Group A with 2-1 victory over Egypt Volgograd Arena.
yoruba: Al Dawsari gbámì ayò mìíràn wọ̀lé, eléyìí tó ran Saudi Arabia lọ́wọ́ láti jáwé olúborí, tí wọ́n sì parí sípò kẹta nípele náà.

english: World Cup: Uruguay pounds hosts Russia 3-0
yoruba: Ìdíje àgbááyé: Uruguay gbonwúro sójú Russia 3-0.

english: Russia’s World Cup honeymoon feel came crashing down on Monday as they were pounded 3-0 by Uruguay.
yoruba: Adùn ìdíje àgbáyé fún Russia forís̩ánpó̩n ló̩jó̩ ajé bí Uruguay s̩e fàgbà han ikọ̀ náà pẹ̀lú 3-0.

english: Luiz Suarez gave Uruguay a 10th minute lead with a sublime free kick that beat the Russian wall to give the South Americans the lead.
yoruba: Atamátàsé agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ iwájú fún Uruguay, Luiz Suarez ló gbá àmì-ayò kínní wọlé nísè̩ẹ́jú mẹ́wàá sáà àkọ́kọ́ tí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà bẹ̀rẹ̀ láti mukò̩ ò̩hún darí.

english: Uruguay made the Russians chase the game as they dictated with crisp passing and runs.
yoruba: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Russia s̩apá wọn láti dámì-ayò ọ̀hún padà, ṣùgbọ́n omi pọ̀ ju ọkà lọ.

english: And it was 2-0 on 23 minutes as Diego Laxalt’s shot deflected off Russian midfielder Cheryshev to keep the South Americans further ahead.
yoruba: Níṣẹ̀ẹ́jú mẹ́tàlélógún Diego Laxalt sọ àmì ayò ọ̀hún di méjì sóódo, èyí tí bó̩ò̩lù rè̩ bá Cheryshev láti mú ikò̩ gúúsù Amé̩ríkà lékè.

english: Akinfeev made a save but Cavani fired in the rebound to open his account for the tournament from a yard out on 90 minutes.
yoruba: Agbábó̩̀ò̩lù amúlé, Akinfeev ti bó̩ò̩lù àgbáwo̩lé s̩ùgbó̩n Cavani tun gba wo̩lé ó sì jé̩ igbà àkó̩kó̩ tá mi àwò̩n nídìíje ò̩hún ní àádọ́rùn-ún iṣẹ́jú

english: Uruguay topped group A with 9 points with no goals conceded.
yoruba: Uruguay lé téńté group A, pẹ̀lú àmì mẹ́sàn-án láì màwò̩n wo̩n.

english: They will face the runners-up of group B, with hosts Russia confronting the winner.
yoruba: Wo̩n yóò kojú ikọ̀ tó bá tè̩lé adarí group B, tí Russia agbanilálejò kojú.

english: President Buhari congratulates Super Eagles
yoruba: Ààrẹ Buhari kí ikọ̀ Super Eagles.

english: President Muhammadu Buhari has congratulated the Super Eagles of Nigeria on their victory on Friday over the national team of Iceland in their second match at the Russia 2018 FIFA World Cup.
yoruba: Ààrẹ orílè̩ èdè Nàìjíríà Muhammadu Buhari ti kí ikọ̀ Super Eagles ti Nàìjííríà fún àṣeyọrí wo̩n ní o̩jọ́ ẹtì lóri ikò̩ Iceland nínú ìfẹsèwọnsẹ̀ wo̩n ẹlẹ́ẹ̀kejì nínú ìdíje àgbáyé 2018 ní Russia.

english: The President expresses particular delight at the confidence, discipline, team-work and indomitable spirit displayed by the young Nigerian players.
yoruba: Ààre̩ s̩e àfihàn ìdùnnú rè̩ sí ìgboyà, ìsé̩ra-e̩ni, ìṣọ̀kan àti è̩mí àìlekùnà tí àwo̩n agbábó̩ò̩lù ò̩dò̩ Nàìjíríà s̩e àfihàn.

english: President Buhari urged them not to limit themselves but sustain the current winning momentum by going all out against their last group opponent, Argentina, next week.
yoruba: Ààrẹ wá rọ̀ wó̩n láti má fojú kéré ara wo̩n s̩ùgbó̩n kí wó̩n tẹ̀síwájú nípa jíjáwé olúborí lórí ikò̩ Argentina, níbi ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ò̩sẹ̀ tó ń bọ̀.

english: According to him: “I am confident that if our players believe in themselves, they can qualify out of their difficult group and even go very far in the tournament,” adding that “with determination, nothing is impossible.”
yoruba: Gẹ́gẹ́ bó s̩e sọ:"ọkàn mí balẹ̀ tíkọ̀ wa bá nígbàgbọ́ nínú ara wọn, dandan ni kí wọ́n pegedé níbi ìpele líle yìí, kí wọ́n sì rìn jìnnà nídìíje náà, “Ó fi kún-un, “pẹ̀lú ìfọkànsìn, kò sáìṣe.

english: The President urges all Nigerians to continue to rally round the Nigerian ambassadors with their prayers and other forms of support.
yoruba: Ààrẹ wá rọ gbogbo ọmọ orílẹ̀ èdè Naijiria láti túbọ̀ máa gbárùkù ti àwọn aṣojú yìí pẹ̀lú àdúrà àti àtìlẹyìn ọlọ́kan-ò-jọ̀kan.

english: Nigeria defeated Iceland by two goals to nil in the match, with Ahmed Musa scoring both goals in the second half of the match.
yoruba: Nàìjííríà lu ikọ̀ Iceland pẹ̀lú àmi ayò méjì sí òdo, Ahmed Musa ló gbá àmì-ayò méjì ọ̀hún wọlé ní ìpele kejì eré ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà.

english: Eagles will do well in subsequent matches – Dalung
yoruba: Dalung: Eagles yóò ṣe dáadáa nífẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ wọn yòókù.

english: Nigeria’s Minister of sports Solomon Dalung says he is optimistic that Nigeria will do well in its subsequent matches.
yoruba: Mínísítà amójú eré-ìdárayá, Solomon Dalung, ní òun nídàánilójú pé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles yóò ṣe dáradára nífẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ wọn yòókù.

english: Solomon Dalung told VON correspondent Rafat Salami that all hope was not lost even though the Super Eagles lost their first game at the World Cup.
yoruba: Solomon Dalung so̩ fún VON, Rafat Salami pé gbogbo ìrètí kó̩ ló ti so̩nù bó tilè̩ jé̩ pé ikò̩ ò̩hún so̩ ìfe̩sèwo̩nsè̩ wo̩n àkó̩kó̩ nù nídìj́ié àgbáyé.

english: He said this at the Nnamdi Azikiwe International airport, Abuja as he arrived from Germany.
yoruba: Ó so̩yí ní pápákọ̀ òfurufú Nnamdi Azikiwe nílùú Àbújá, bí ó s̩e ti Germany dé.

english: Russia 2018: Japan stuns Colombia 2-1
yoruba: Russia 2018: Japan fàgbà han Colombia.

english: Japan’s defeat of Colombia makes it the first time they have ever defeated South American opposition at this level.
yoruba: Japan tó fàgbà hàn Colombia, só̩ di ìgbà àkó̩kó̩ tí wo̩n yóò borí alátakò̩ láti gúúsù ìwọ̀ oòrùn Amerika.

english: All bets were on Colombia repeating their 2014 blowout of Japan – they thrashed the Blue Samurai 4-1 in Brazil.
yoruba: Ò̩pò̩ àwọn olólùfé̩ bó̩ò̩lù àfẹsègbá, tí wón ń ta té̩té́ ló gbówó lórí orílè̩-èdè Colombia pé wọn yóò borí.

english: One of the goals scored by Japan was a penalty kick.
yoruba: Ò̩kan lára àmì-ayò tí Japan gbáwọlé, ló wá látojú bọ́ọ̀lù agbésílẹ̀gbá́.

english: They got a penalty after Colombian defender Carlos Sanchez blocked a goal-bound shot from Japan’s Yuya Osako.
yoruba: Wó̩n rí bọ́ọ̀lù agbésílẹ̀gbà lé̩yìn tagbé̩yìn fún Colombia, Carlos Sanchez dènà s̩ó̩ò̩tì à-mi-àwò̩n látò̩do̩ Yuya Osako ti Japan.

english: Super Eagles hold early training session, prepare for Croatia
yoruba: Super Eagles bẹ̀èrẹ̀ ìgbáradì ní kíkún fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ Croatia.

english: The Super Eagles held their training session today at 10.15am.
yoruba: Ikò̩ Super Eagles bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìgbáradì wo̩n lónìí ní 10:15am àárò̩.

english: The training was opened for the first 15 minutes, with focus on team tactics.
yoruba: Ìgbáradì náà s̩íde nís̩è̩é̩jú mé̩è̩dógún àkó̩kó̩, wó̩n sì gùnlé ète ikò̩ náà.

english: Canada, U.S, Mexico to host 2026 World Cup
yoruba: Canada, U.S, Mexico yóò ṣagbáterù ìdíje àgbáyé 2026.

english: The 2026 World Cup will be held in the United States, Canada and Mexico after they beat Morocco by a margin of 69 votes to host the tournament which will be expanded to 48 teams for the first time.
yoruba: Amẹ́ríkà, Canada àti Mexico yóò ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje àgbááyé ló̩dún 2026, lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n jáwé olú́borí pè̩lú ò̩kándínláàdó̩rin ibò láàrin wo̩n sí orílẹ̀-èdè Morocco tí òun náà ń gbèrò láti ṣagbátẹrù ìdíje ọ̀hún, èyí tíkò̩ máa di méjìdínláàdo̩ta fúngbà àkó̩kó̩.

english: Lopetegui succeeds Zidane at Madrid
yoruba: Lopetegui rọ́pọ̀ Zidane ni Madrid.

english: European champions Real Madrid have appointed current Spain coach Julen Lopetegui as their manager from next season.
yoruba: Ikọ̀ Real Madrid ti yan akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá Spain, Julen Lopetegui gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá tuntun sáà tó ń bọ̀.

english: Lopetegui, fifty one years (51), succeeds Zinedine Zidane who stepped down after leading the LaLiga giants to three straight UEFA Champions League titles.
yoruba: Lopetegui, ọmọ ọdún mọ́kànléláàdọ́ta (51), rọ́pò Zinedine Zidane, lẹ́ni tó kò̩ láti tè̩síwájú gé̩gé̩ bi akó̩nimò̩ó̩gbá wo̩n, lẹ́yìn to ran ikò̩ ọ̀hún lọ́wọ́ láti gbafe-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje UEFA Champions League nígbà mẹ́ta léra ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀.

english: “Julen Lopetegui will be the coach of Real Madrid after the 2018 World Cup.
yoruba: Julen Lopetegui ni yóò jẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ Real Madrid lẹ́yìn ìdíje àgbááyé 2018.

english: Lopetegui was appointed Spain coach in 2016.
yoruba: "Lopetegui bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ sí ní tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Spain láti ọdún 2016.

english: He was previously FC Porto manager.
yoruba: Bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ó fìgbà kan jẹ́ akónimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù FC Porto.

english: He played briefly for both Real Madrid and Barcelona.
yoruba: Ó tún kópa fúnkọ̀ Real Madrid àti Barcelona.

english: Russia 2018: Germany arrive for title defence
yoruba: Russia 2018: Germany gunlè̩ fún ìdíje àgbáye.

english: The Premier League stars met Erdogan in London last month with Gundogan handing him a signed Manchester City shirt with the message “to my president”.
yoruba: Àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù English Premier League pàdé Erdogan nílùú London lóṣù tó kọjá, èyí tó mú Gundogan fẹ̀wù ìgbábọ́ọ̀lù ikọ̀ Manchester City rẹ̀ ránsẹ́ sáàrẹ rè̩.

english: Germany landed in Moscow on Tuesday to attempt to successfully defend their World Cup title and hoping to leave the political controversy surrounding Mesut Oziland IlkayGundogan behind them.
yoruba: Germany balẹ̀ sí Moscow lọ́jọ́ ìṣé̩gun, pè̩lú èròǹgbà láti dààbò bò ife-ẹ̀yẹ àgbááyé tó wà lọ́wọ́ wọn, pè̩lú ìrètí láti mọ́kàn kúrò nínú gbogbo awuyewuye òṣèlú tó rò̩ mó̩ Mesut Ozil àti Ilkay Gundogan.

english: Their buildup was dogged by the controversy surrounding Ozil and Gundogan after the players, who have Turkish roots, were booed in pre-World Cup friendlies for meeting Turkish President RecepTayyip Erdogan.
yoruba: Nínú gbogbo ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́, làwọn olólùfẹ́ ikọ̀ náà bẹnu àté̩ lu Ozil àti Gundogan tí wọ́n jágbá́bọ́ọ̀lù Germany ṣùgbọ́n wọ́n tan mó̩ Turkey fún pípàdé ààrẹ ilẹ̀ Turkey RecepTayyip Erdogan.

english: Ghanaian football official accused of corruption resigns from FIFA
yoruba: Òṣìṣé̩ àjọ Ghana fis̩é̩ FIFA sí̀̀lè̩ nítorí ìfè̩sùn ìwàbàjé̩ kàn-án.

english: Under investigation in Ghana for alleged corruption, FIFA Council member Kwesi Nyantakyi has resigned from the world soccer body.
yoruba: Òṣìṣé̩ àjọ FIFA, Kwesi Nyantakyi, ti fipò sílẹ̀ lájọ FIFA, látàrí ẹ̀sùn ìwàbàjé̩ tí wọ́n fi kàn án, ìwádìí sì ń lo̩ lábé̩lè̩ ní Ghana lórí ìwàbàjé̩̩.

english: CAF president Ahmad says Nyantakyi also offered his resignation as first vice president of the continental body.
yoruba: Ààrẹ àjọ CAF, Ahmad náà fikún un pé, Nyantakyi tún kọ̀wé fipò rẹ̀ sílẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí igbákejì ààrẹ àjọ ọ̀hún.

english: Ahmad tells more than fifty (50) African football federations a special election meeting will be held Sept. 30 in Egypt for them to fill the vacancies.
yoruba: Ahmad wá kéde ètòòdìbò ni Egypt lọ́gbọ̀n ọjọ́, oṣù kẹsàn-án ọdún 2018, fún àádọ́ta (50) àwọn àjọ amójútó bó̩ò̩lù àfe̩sè̩gbá nílè̩ Áfíríkà, fún ipò tó ṣófo.

english: Candidates will come from the English-speaking group in CAF, the president says.
yoruba: Olùdíje yóò wá láti orílè̩-èdè tó ń so̩ Gè̩é̩sì, ààre̩ CAF sò̩yí.

english: A television documentary last week showed Nyantakyi taking $65,000 in cash from undercover reporters posing as businessmen to secure favor with Ghana President Nana Akufo-Addo and other government officials.
yoruba: Ló̩sè̩ tó kọjá lẹ̀rọ amóhùnmáwòrán ṣàfihàn Nyantakyi tó gba $65,000 só̩wó̩, ló̩wó̩ akò̩ro̩yìn tó mò̩-ó̩n-mò̩ s̩e bí olókòwò, láti rójú rere ààrẹ Ghana, Nana Akufo-Addo àtàwọn òṣìsé̩ ìjọba mìíràn.

english: Nadal beats Thiem to win his 11th French Open
yoruba: Nadal fàgbà han Thiem láti gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ French Open.

english: Rafael Nadal hailed his 11th French Open title as “just incredible” after he demolished Austria’s Dominic Thiem 6-4, 6-3, 6-2 despite a worrying injury scare in the closing stages of Sunday’s final.
yoruba: Rafael Nadal bori nínú àṣekágbá ìdíje French Open, lé̩yìn tí ó yanjú akẹẹgbé̩ rè̩ Dominic Thiem ti Austria pèlú àmì-àyò 6-4, 6-3, 6-2 pè̩lú ìs̩elés̩e adérùbani rè̩ lópin ìdíje náà ló̩jó̩ Áìkú.

english: The 32-year-old world number one now has 17 Grand Slam titles, just three behind great rival Roger Federer.
yoruba: O̩mọ ọdún méjílélọ́gbọ̀n (32) tó mò̩-ó̩n gbá jùlọ ti gbàpapọ̀ ifeẹ̀yẹ mẹ́tàdínlógún, mé̩ta péré lalátakò rè̩ kòríkòsùn Roger Federer fi jùú.

english: Nadal endured a nervy conclusion to the final, however, when he needed treatment in the fourth game of the third set for a finger injury before sealing victory on a fifth match point when Thiem fired a backhand long.
yoruba: Nadal fàyànrán ìdíje náà dé òpin, àmó̩ ó nílò ìtó̩jú ní ìpele ke̩rin nígbà tí ó fọwọ́ ṣèse ní ìpele kẹta ìdíje ò̩hún, kí ó tó fakọyọ láti gbon ewúro sí Thiem lójú nínú àṣekágbá ìdíje náà lárà ọ̀tọ̀.

english: “It’s really just incredible, I played a great match against a great player,” said Nadal.
yoruba: Nadal ní, “Ìfigagbága yìí lágbára púpọ̀, mo wò̩yá ìjà ńlá pè̩lú alátakò tó mò̩-ó̩n gba.”

english: To win eleven (11) times here it’s fantastic and not something I ever dreamed of.
yoruba: Láti gbafe è̩yẹ ìdíje yìí nígbà mọ́kànlá (11) ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀, jóhun tí mi ò ronú kàn.

english: So I hope to see you all again next year.”
yoruba: Mo nígbàgbó̩ rírí gbogbo yín ló̩dún tí ó ń bò̩.

english: Nadal joins Australia’s Margaret Court as the only player to win 11 titles at the same major.
yoruba: Nadal darapò̩ mó Margaret Court ti Australia bi òǹdíje tó gba ifeẹ̀yẹ ò̩hún nígbà mọ́kànlá.

english: Victory also took Nadal’s record at Roland Garros to eighty-six (86) wins and just two losses.
yoruba: Jíjáwé olú́borí Nadal náà mú ìfigagbága rẹ̀ ni Roland Garros di ajáwé-olúborí mé̩rìndínláàdó̩rùn-ún (86), tó sì kùnà lé̩è̩mejì.

english: With a celebrity audience including actors Hugh Grant and Tim Roth as well as French stars Marion Cotillard and Jean Dujardin watching, Nadal flew out of the blocks.
yoruba: Pè̩lú àwọn òǹwò̩ran gbajúgbajà bíi òs̩èré Hugh Grant àti Tim Roth, àtàwo̩n òs̩èré o̩mo̩ Faransé Marion Cottillard ati Jean Dujardin tí wó̩n ń wòran bí Nadal s̩e bè̩rè̩.

english: French open: Del Potro whips Cilic, to face Nadal
yoruba: Del Potro fàgbà hàn Cilic, láti lọ kojú Nadal.

english: Argentina’s Juan Martin Del Potro came through a clash of the titans against Marin Cilic to reach his first French Open semi-final for nine years on Thursday, winning a rain-delayed duel 7-6, 5-7, 6-3, and 7-5.
yoruba: Del Potro ti Argentina, kópá ribiribi láti borí Marian Cilic èyí tó mu yege fúnpele sè̩mí ní French Open fúngbà àkó̩kó̩ lé̩yìn o̩dún mé̩sàn-án ló̩jó̩bò̩, tójò síì dáfigagbága 7-6, 5-7, 6-3 at̀i 7-5 ò̩hún dúro.

english: Del Potro needed only two points to pocket the first set as Cilic blinked first, netting a routine forehand a 5-6.
yoruba: Del Potro nílò àmì ayò méjì péré láti kó̩kó̩ borí ìpele kìn-ín-ní tí Cilic sì s̩e  ń kó̩kó̩ borí pè̩lú 5-6.

english: Croatian Cilic played an awful game when serving for the set, making four unforced errors, but he was gifted another chance to serve for the set after breaking Del Potro again and at the second time of asking he leveled the match.
yoruba: Cilic o̩mo̩ Croatia kò kópa dáradára nígbà tó kó̩kó̩ pàdánù àmì-ayò níbè̩rè̩, ó sì ń s̩às̩ìs̩e̩ pé̩é̩pè̩è̩pé̩, ṣùgbọ́n ó ní àǹfààní láti tún s̩íde nígbà tó ti ń kápá Del Potro, àkókò yìí ní ó sì ní àmì-ayò tó dó̩gbá pè̩lú rè̩.

english: FIFA ranking: Nigeria drops to 48th  position
yoruba: Nàìjííríà jáwálẹ̀ nínú́ àtẹ tuntun àjọ FIFA.

english: Nigeria has dropped a point from its last month’s 47th position to 48 place in the world, and from sixth to seventh in the continent, in the latest FIFA rankings.
yoruba: Nínú ipò àtẹ tuntun àjọ FIFA tó ṣèṣẹ̀ jáde, orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà ti jawálẹ̀ láti ipò mẹ́tàdínláàdọ́ta (47)  sípò méjídínláàdọ́ta (48) lágbàáyé, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni láti ipò kẹfà sí ipò keje nílẹ̀ Afrika.

english: A statement by FIFA said the recent flurry of pre-World Cup friendlies left its mark on the latest rankings.
yoruba: Àjọ FIFA ní, ò̩kan-ò-jòkan ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ wà lára ohun tí wọ́n ṣàgbéyẹ̀wò rè̩ fún àbájáde ipò àtẹ tuntun náà.

english: While the top three positions in the world are unchanged as Germany, Brazil and Belguim sit respectively, Russia-bound duo of Poland and Uruguay have succeeded in making strides within the top 20.
yoruba: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, nínú ipò àtẹ tuntun ọ̀hún lágbàáyé, orílẹ̀-èdè Germany, Brazil àti Belguim síì dipò wọn mú ní ìtẹ̀léǹtẹ̀lé, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, Russia, Poland ati Uruguay láǹfààní láti wà láàrin ipò kínní sí ogún.

english: Super Eagles World Cup Group D foes Argentina, Croatia and Iceland are on fifth, 20th and 22nd positions respectively.
yoruba: Argentina dipò karùn-ún mú, Croatia dipò ogún mú, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni Iceland wà nípò méjìlélógún.

english: In Africa, Tunisia moved seven places down from 14th in the previous rankings to 21 as the continent’s top ranked team.
yoruba: Ní Afíríkà, Tunisia jáwálè̩ láti ipò ke̩rìnlá tí wó̩n wà tè̩lé̩ dé ìko̩kànlélógún gé̩gé̩ bi o̩mo̩ Afíríkà tó wà nípò tó ga jù lágbàáyé.

english: Senegal follows in 27th place while DR Congo stayed on 38 with Russia-bound Morocco on 41st place and Egypt in 45th position.
yoruba: Senegal tè̩lée nípò ke̩tàdínló̩gbò̩n (27), tí DR Congo sì dúró sípò kejìdínlógójì, tí Morrocco sì wà nípò ko̩kànlélógójì àti Egypt ní ipò karùndínláàdó̩ta.

english: Ghana, a non-participant at the World Cup moved three places to 47th and sixth in the region.
yoruba: Ghana, Aláìkópa nídije àgbááyé náà wà nípò kẹ́tàdínláàdọ́ta wọ́n sì dipò kẹfà mú lÁfíríkà.

english: The next rankings will be released on July 19.
yoruba: Ipò àtẹ tuntun mìíràn yóò jáde ní July 19.

english: Putin warns governors – Don’t turn World Cup sites into markets
yoruba: Putin kìlò̩ fún àwo̩n gómìnà – Ẹ má sàyíká pápáṣèré dilé-ìtajà.

english: Infrastructure built in Russia for the World Cup should pay off in the future and be used for the development of popular sports, the president stressed.
yoruba: Ààrẹ ni kí wó̩n má s̩e sọ àwọn ìpàgó̩ ìgbábó̩ò̩lù tàbí àyíká pápá ìṣeré Russia tí wọn yóò lò fún ìdíje bó̩ò̩lù àgbááyé di ilé ìtajà.

english: Wake-up! Ex-Internationals challenge Eagles to ‘find their form’
yoruba: Ẹ tají! Agbábó̩ó̩lù tẹ́lẹ̀rí pe Eagles níjà bíborí

english: Following Nigeria’s 1-0 loss to Czech Republic at the Rudolf-Tonn-Stadion in Austria, ex-Internationals have warned that the Super Eagles must wake-up if they want to make an impact at 2018 world cup in Russia.
yoruba: Lé̩yìn ìkùnà 1-0 ikò̩ Nàìjííà só̩wó̩ ikò̩ Czech Republic ní pápá-ìs̩iré Rudolf-Tonn-Stadion ni Austria, àwọn agbábò̩ò̩lù té̩lè̩rí ti ikọ̀ Super Eagles ṣèkìlò̩ títají wo̩n tí wó̩n bá fé̩ nípa nínú ìdíje àgbááyé Russia 2018.

english: Former Super Eagles winger Emmanuel Amuneke warned that the team risk crashing out of the 2018 FIFA World Cup in the group stages if they do not improve on their performances before their opening game against Croatia.
yoruba: Agbábó̩ò̩lù è̩gbé̩-iwájú té̩lè̩rí fúnkò̩ Super Eagles  Emmanuel Amunike s̩èkìlò pé tíkò̩ ò̩hún kò bá fé̩ já nídìíje FIFA 2018 ní ìpele àkó̩kó̩, tí wó̩n ò bá yípadà nífe̩sè̩wo̩nsè̩ wo̩n onírúurú kí wo̩n tó figagbága pè̩lú Croatia ní ìfe̩sè̩wo̩nsè̩ ìs̩íde.

english: Speaking with Complete Sports, Amuneke described the Eagles’ performance against Czech republic as “not impressive.”
yoruba: Bíbá Complete Sports sò̩rò̩, Amúníke s̩àpèjúwe ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ikò̩ Eagles pè̩lú Czech Republic bíi “àìdára rárá”

english: Corroborating Amunike’s position, former midfielder Garba Lawal fingered Nigeria’s slow start in games as a reason for their recent defeats in their pre-World Cup friendlies.
yoruba: Garba Lawal kín ihà Àmúníke ko̩ sèyí, ó s̩àkíyèsí pékò̩ Nàìjíríà kò bè̩rè̩ dáadáa láwo̩n ìfe̩sè̩wò̩nsè̩ èyí tí pípàdánù àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ o̩ló̩rè̩é̩jó̩rè̩é̩ sì fà á.

english: Nigeria announces starting eleven against Czech Republic
yoruba: Nàìjííría kéde agbábọ́ọ̀lù mọ́kànlá tá kojú Czech Republic.

english: Nigeria manager Gernot Rohr has announced his starting eleven for Wednesday afternoon’s international friendly against the Czech Republic in Austria.
yoruba: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà Gernot Rohr ti kéde agbábó̩ò̩lù mọ́kànlá fún ìfe̩sè̩wo̩nsè̩ o̩ló̩rè̩é̩jó̩rè̩é̩ ló̩sàn-án ojórú pè̩lú ikò̩ Czech Republic ní orílè̩-èdè Austria.

english: It is now very clear that Deportivo de La Coruña starlet Francis Uzoho is the country’s undisputed first-choice goalkeeper leading up to the World Cup as he starts his fifth straight game for the national team.
yoruba: Ó ti wá fara hàn gbangbagbangba báyìí pé, aṣọ́lé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Deportivo de La Corua, Francis Uzoho ni yóò jẹ́ aṣọ́lé kínní ikọ̀ ọ̀hún fún ìdíje àgbááyé náà, lẹ́yìí tí yóò tún ṣọ́lé nínú ìfigagbága náà.

english: The defenders selected are Abdullahi Shehu, Leon Balogun, William Troost-Ekong and Brian Idowu.
yoruba: Àwọn agbábó̩ò̩lù ọwó̩-ẹ̀yìn ni Abdullahi Shehu, Leon Balogun, William Troost-Ekong àti Brian Idowu.

english: The five players who have been chosen in midfield are John Ogu, Wilfred Ndidi, John Obi Mikel, Alex Iwobi and Victor Moses, meaning Joel Obi and Eddy Onazi drop to the bench following their dismal showing against England.
yoruba: Agbábó̩ò̩lù márùn-ún tí wó̩n yàn fún o̩wó̩-àárín ni John Ogu, Wilfred Ndidi, John Obi Mikel, Alex Iwobi àti Victor Moses, ó túmò̩ sí pé Joel Obi àti Eddy Onazi yóò jókòó lé̩yìn ìgbábó̩ò̩lù tí kò wúnilórí pèlú England.

english: Former Watford star Odion Ighalo is given the nod in attack ahead of Kelechi Iheanacho and Simeon Tochukwu Nwankwo.
yoruba: Agbábó̩ò̩lù dáadáa fún Watford té̩lè, ìye̩n Odion Ighalo, Kelechi Iheanacho àti Simeon Tochukwu Nwankwo ló ní àǹfààní láti gbówó̩-iwájú.

english: Nigeria Starting 11: Uzoho, Shehu, Troost-Ekong, Balogun, Idowu, Ogu, Ndidi, Iwobi, Mikel, Moses, Ighalo
yoruba: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù mọ́kànlá ọ̀hún: Uzoho, Shehu, Troost-Ekong, Balogun, Idowu, Ogu, Ndidi, Iwobi, Mikel, Moses, Ighalo.

english: Confirmed: Arsenal signs Lichtsteiner
yoruba: Lichtsteiner darapò̩ mó̩ Arsenal.

english: Arsenal have signed Swiss defender Stephan Lichtsteiner from Italian champions Juventus on a free transfer, the Premier League club said on Tuesday.
yoruba: Arsenal ti ra agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́-ẹ̀yìn alágbárà Italy, Juventus, o̩mo̩ Switzerland, Stephan Lichtsteiner, ló̩fè̩é̩ èyí tó di mímò̩ ló̩jó̩ ìs̩é̩gun láte̩nu ikò̩ Arsenal.

english: The 34-year-old made more than 250 appearances for Juve, winning the Serie A title in each of his seven seasons at the club.
yoruba: Ọmọ ọdún mẹ́rìnlélọ́gbọ̀n náà gbápapò̩ ìfẹsè̩wọnsè̩ àádó̩tálélúgba fúnkò̩ Juve, ó sì gbafe-è̩yẹ ìdíje Serie A fún ìgbà méje ò̩tò̩ò̩tò̩ tó fi wà níbè̩.

english: He was named captain of Switzerland in 2016 and has earned 99 caps for his country.
yoruba: Wó̩n só̩ di balógun ikò̩ Switzerland lọ́dún 2016, ó sì ti gbápapò̩ ìfe̩sè̩wọnsè̩ mọ́kàndínlọ́gọ́rùn-ún fún wo̩n.

english: He is new Arsenal head coach Unai Emery’s first signing since taking over from Arsene Wenger last month.
yoruba: Òun lagbábó̩ò̩lù kìíní takó̩nimò̩ó̩gbá tuntun Arsenal, Unai Emery ráà lé̩yìn tó gbaṣé̩ ló̩wó̩ Arsene Wenger lóṣù tó kọjá.

english: Stephan brings huge experience and leadership to our squad.
yoruba: Stephan mú ìrírí àtidarí àìlé̩gbé̩ wánú e̩gbé̩ yìí.

english: He’s a player with great quality with a very positive and determined attitude.
yoruba: Ó jé̩ agbábó̩ò̩lù tó dára gan-an tó sì ní ìs̩esí àti ìfojúsùn tó dáa.”

english: “Stephan will improve us on and off the pitch,” Emery said in a statement.
yoruba: Emery so̩ pé, “Stephan yóò rankò̩ yìí ló̩wó̩ yálà lórí pápá tàbí níbò mìíràn”.

english: On his part, Lichtsteiner expressed happiness joining the North Londoners at the Emirates.
yoruba: Lábala Lichtsteiner, ó fìdùnnú rè̩ hàn láti darapò̩ mó̩ agbábó̩ò̩lù ihà àríwá London.

english: “Happy and honoured to be a Gunner! Will work hard and passionately day in and day out to achieve our sportive objectives and to win trophies with this great club,” he said via twitter.
yoruba: Pè̩lú è̩ro̩ twitter rè̩, ó ní, “Inúu mí dùn, mo sì mo̩ iyì rè̩ láti je̩ o̩mo̩ Gunner! Màá s̩iṣé̩ takuntakun lójoojúmó̩ láti ríi dájú pé, a mú gbogbo àfojúsùn wa pátá sí ìmúṣẹ”.

english: Lichtsteiner began his senior career at Swiss club Grasshoppers Zurich in 2001 and played for Lille in France, as well as Lazio in Italy before joining Juventus in 2011.
yoruba: Lichtsteiner bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣé̩ agbábó̩ò̩lù rè̩ nínú ikò̩ Grasshoppers Zurich ti Switzerland ló̩dún 2001, ó tè̩síwájú ní Lille ti France, àti Lazio ní Italy kó tó lo̩ Juventus ló̩dún 2011.

english: Russia 2018: Iran hit Russia
yoruba: Russia 2018: Iran kanlè̩ sí Russia.

english: Iran became the first team on Tuesday to arrive in Russia for the World Cup, a month-long celebration of football that kicks off in Moscow’s historic Luzhniki Stadium on June 14.
yoruba: Ikò̩ agbábó̩ó̩lù Iran jé̩kò̩ àkó̩kó̩ tí yóò balẹ̀ sí orílẹ̀-èdè Russia ló̩jó̩ ìṣẹ́gun, ṣaájú ìdíje bó̩ò̩lù àgbááyé tí yóò bè̩è̩rè̩ ní pápáàṣeré Luzhniki ló̩jó̩ ke̩rìnlá, oṣù kẹfà ọdún táa wà yìí.

english: Playing in their fifth finals and ranked 36 by FIFA, Iran begins their campaign against Group B rivals Morocco on June 15 in Nizhny Novgorod.
yoruba: Iran yóò kojú Morocco nínú ìfẹsè̩wo̩nsè̩ kìíní wọn ló̩jó̩ karùndínlógún, oṣù kẹfà ní pápáàṣeré Nizhny Novgorod. Ìgbàkarùn-ún Iran rèé, FIFA sì fi wó̩n sípò ke̩rìndínlógójì.

english: They then travel to Kazan for a June 20 clash against former World Cup winners Spain, before concluding their group stage matches against Portugal on June 25.
yoruba: Bákan náà, wọn yóò rìnrìnàjò lo̩ Kazan ní June 20 láti kojú agbéfe àná ikò̩ Spain, kí wó̩n tó pajú rè̩ dé pè̩lú Portugal ni June 25.

english: Iran lost 2:1 to Turkey in their last friendly on May 28, and have one last World Cup warm-up against Lithuania on June 8.
yoruba: Iran pàdánù ìfẹsè̩wọnsè̩ ọló̩rè̩é̩́jò̩ré̩ pè̩lú Turkey, pè̩lú àmì-ayò 2:1 ni May 28, wọn a tún gbáfẹsè̩wọnsè̩ ọlọ́rè̩é̩jò̩ré̩ mìíràn pè̩lú Lithuania ló̩jó̩ ke̩jo̩, oṣù kẹfà.

english: Uzoho is good, we don’t have goalkeeping issues – Rohr
yoruba: Rohr ní Uzoho dára, a kò níṣòro asó̩lé rárá.

english: Head coach of the senior national team of Nigeria Gernot Rohr has revealed the qualities he admires the most in young goalkeeper Francis Odinaka Uzoho and the coach has also declared that the Super Eagles don’t have goalkeeper issue.
yoruba: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà fún ikò̩ agbábó̩ò̩lù àgbà ti Nàìjíríà, Gernot Rohr ti ṣe àfihàn àbùdá pàtàkì jùlo̩ tí ó rí lára asó̩lé ò̩dó̩ ti ikò̩ ò̩hún, Francis Odinaka Uzoho, ó sì tún ní ikò̩ Super Eagles ko níṣòro aṣó̩lé rárá.

english: Speaking after the 1-2 friendly loss against England, Rohr played down ‎talks about a goalkeeper crisis in his team ahead of the start of the World Cup in Russia, insisting that his three goalkeepers are up to the task of doing well in Russia.
yoruba: Rohr sò̩rò̩ ò̩hún lé̩yìn ìfe̩sè̩wọnsè̩ ọló̩rè̩é̩jò̩ré̩ tíkò̩ náà pàdánù só̩wó̩ England pè̩lú àmì-ayò kan sí méjì, ó ní kò sí wàhálà kankan pè̩lú as̩o̩lé kí ìdíjé àgbááyé ní Russia tó bè̩rè̩, ó te̩numó̩o̩ pé àwo̩n as̩ó̩lé mé̩ta rè̩ tó gbangba sùn ló̩yé̩ ní Russia.

english: “I trust our goalkeeper, I hear here and then that we have goalkeepers problem but no we don’t have goalkeeper problems”, Rohr said.
yoruba: “Mo ní ìgbé̩kè̩lé pè̩lú àwo̩n as̩ó̩lé wa, bí ó tilè̩ jé̩ pé mo gbó̩ ìkùnsínú òun awuyewuye ló̩dò̩ àwo̩n onífèé bó̩ò̩lù pé ikò̩ wa ní ìs̩òro pè̩lú àwo̩n as̩ó̩lé”, Rohr ló sò̩yí.

english: “He did very well against England and we are working a lot with him, we sent our goalkeeper coach twice to train him at Deportivo La Coruna to help him on some aspect of his game.
yoruba: “Ó ṣe dáradára nínú ìfẹsè̩wọnsè̩ pè̩lú England, a sì ń ṣiṣé̩ síi pè̩lú rè̩ láti túbò̩ ràn án ló̩wó̩ síi, èyí tó ṣokùnfà ìdí tí a fi rán akó̩nimò̩ó̩mú ikò̩ yìí lọ sí Deportivo La Coruna láti lọ ràn án ló̩wó̩ nínú àwọn kùdìè̩-kudiẹ rè̩ tó kù.

english: He is the third choice at La Coruna but he is doing well.
yoruba: As̩ó̩lé ke̩ta ló jé̩ ní La Coruna ó sì ń gbìyànjú.

english: He is quiet , he is tall, he can come out , he is good on the line but he has to work.
yoruba: E̩ni jé̩jé̩ ni, ó ga, ó máa ń jáde, o dára nílà rè̩ ó sì nílò is̩é̩ si.

english: What I like in him a lot is that he is very humble”, he concluded.
yoruba: Ohun tí mo fé̩ràn jù nípaa rè̩ ni ìwà ìrè̩lè̩,” ó sò̩yí.

english: England vs Nigeria: Mikel, Iheanacho optimistic of good outing
yoruba: England àti Naijiria: Mikel àti Iheanacho ń gbèrò fífakọyọ.

english: Members of the super eagles have expressed optimism that they will give the Three Lions of England a run for their money when they meet at Wembley stadium in London on Saturday.
yoruba: Àwọn ọmọ ẹgbé̩ agbábó̩ò̩lù Super Eagles ti Nàìjíríà ti fìrètí hàn pé dídùn lọsàn á so nínú ìdíje ọló̩rè̩só̩rè̩é̩ tí wó̩n fé̩ gbá pè̩lú Three Lions ti England ní London ló̩jó̩ Àbámé̩ta.

english: Many Nigerian fans have criticized the Eagles for a “not-too-impressive” performance in their friendly match against the Leopards of DR Congo in Port Harcourt on Monday which ended 1-1.
yoruba: Ò̩pò̩ ọmọ Nàìjíríà be̩nu àté̩ lu ẹgbé̩ agbábó̩ò̩lù Super Eagles fún ìs̩o̩wó̩gbá ìdíjé o̩ló̩rè̩é̩jó̩rè̩é̩ wo̩n pè̩lú Leopard ti DR Congo nílùú Port Harcourt ló̩jó̩ ajé tó parí pè̩lú ò̩mì.

english: The Nigerians played two friendly matches in March, struggling to beat Poland 1-0 in Warsaw; but fell tamely 0-2 to Serbia a few days after in London
yoruba: Ìdíje tí wọ́n gbá pẹ̀lú Poland náà kò wúni lórí tó nítorí agídí ni wọ́n fi gbá 1-0 tí Serbia si nà wọ́n pẹ̀lú 2-0 ní London.

english: However speaking from London, Eagles captain John Mikel Obi said the team had corrected early mistakes, and was ready for battle against a familiar foe.
yoruba: Sísò̩rò̩ láti ìlú London, balógun Eagles Mikel Obi níkò̩ ò̩hún ti ṣàtúnṣe gbogbo àṣìṣe wọn, ó sì ti s̩e̩tán fún ìfigagbága pè̩lú alátakò bíi wó̩n.

english: Africa Youth Games: 26 Kwara athletes invited to camp
yoruba: Ìdíje ò̩dó̩ nílè̩ Adúláwò̩: Kwara káwọn 26 lọ̀pàgó̩ fúngbàáradì.

english: Twenty six Athletes from Kwara State have been invited to camp in ten different sports ahead of the preparations for the Africa Youth Games, holding in Algiers, Algeria, later in the year.
yoruba: Eléré sísá mé̩rìndínló̩gbò̩n nípìnínlè̩ Kwara ti kó lọ sípàgó̩ fúngbàáradì de ìdíje oríṣìí eré ìdárayá mé̩wàá tí yóò wáyé ní eré àwọn ò̩dó̩ ilè̩ Adúláwò̩ ní Algiers ni orílè̩ èdè Algeria láìpé̩.

english: Making the list available to Sportswriters, the State Director of Sports, Mallam Tunde Kazeem added that three coaches, Tajudeen Sulaiman (Badminton), Sidiq Bolaji (Wushu Kung Fu) and Sulaiman Abdulkareem Angulu (Rugby) have also gotten invitation to prepare athletes in their sports for the youth Games.
yoruba: Pípèsè àwo̩n akó̩pa fún eré-ìdárayá náà fún àwo̩n akò̩rò̩yìn eré-ìdárayá, olùdarí eré-ìdárayá nípìnínlè̩ náà, ìye̩n Mallam Tunde Kazeem, ní àwo̩n akó̩nimò̩ó̩gbá mé̩ta náà, Tajudeen Sulaiman (Badminton), Sidiq Bolaji (Wushu Kung Fu) àti Sulaiman Abdulkareem Angulu (Rugby) ti gbàpè láti s̩ègbáradì fún àwo̩n akópá ìdíje ò̩hún.

english: Mallam Tunde Kazeem, who is also the Chairman of the Directors of Sports Forum in Nigeria, charged the athletes to justify their selection, and to be good ambassadors of the state at the national trials.
yoruba: Mallam Tunde Kazeem, tó tún jé̩ alága fún adarí eré-ìdárayá ní Nàìjíríà, gbà wó̩n nímò̩ràn láti fìdí yíyàn wo̩n múlè̩, kí wó̩n sì fi ìpínlè̩ wo̩n yangàn níbi ìdíje tó fé̩ wáyé ní orílèèdè yìí.

english: We lost a star – NTTF mourns Seun Ajetunmobi’s death
yoruba: NTTF ń sọ̀fọ̀ Seun Ajetunmobi tó ti di olóògbé.

english: Ajetunmobi, born  on Oct.10, 1985, died on Thursday in Lagos as a result of gas explosion.
yoruba: Ajetunmobi, tí wó̩n bí Oct 10, ọdún 1985 lo kú ló̩jó̩bò̩ nílùú Èkó látàrí afé̩fé̩ gáàsì.

english: Anderson Bankole, a board member of NTTF, speaking in Lagos noted that the federation had lost one of its key players.
yoruba: Anderson Bankole, ò̩kan lára àwọn ọmọò̩gbìmò̩ ìṣàkóso NTTF, sísò̩rò̩ nílùú Èkó so̩ pájo̩ ò̩hún so̩ ò̩kan lára àwo̩n ògbóǹtirigi wo̩n nù.

english: Also, a table-tennis coach with Lagos State, Samson Ajayi, said that the player exhibited impressive performances as a national player in his life time.
yoruba: Samson Ajayi, ò̩kan lára àwọn akó̩nimò̩ó̩gbá ní ìpínlè̩ Èkó ròyìn akitiyan olóògbé náà fún ìdàgbàsókè eré ìdárayá yìí kí o̩ló̩jó̩ tó dé wá mú.

english: Rohr introduces GPS trackers to maximize training, performance
yoruba: Rohr ṣàgbékalẹ̀ ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé GPS trackers" tí yóò ṣàfihàn ipa àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù lórí pápá.

english: Super Eagles coach Gernot Rohr has instructed national team players to wear GPS trackers before the start of the training session.
yoruba: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá  ikọ̀ Super Eagles, Gernot Rohr ti pàṣẹ fún àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù rẹ̀ láti máa wọ ẹ̀wù ìgbàlódé, kí wọn ó tó bẹ̀rẹ̀ ìgbáradì, tí a mọ̀ sí (GPS trackers), èyí tí yóò máa ṣàfihàn bí agbábọ́ọ̀lù kọ̀ọ̀kan ṣe ń kópa sí nínú ìgbáradì ọlọ́kan-ò-jọ̀kan wọn.

english: Odion Ighalo heads to Uyo to join team mates
yoruba: Odion Ighalo dara pọ̀ mọ́ àwọn akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ nílùú Uyo.

english: Super Eagles striker Odion Ighalo landed in Lagos from London on Tuesday morning and has given his word that he will link up with his international teammates in Uyo later today.
yoruba: Odion Ighalo balẹ̀ sí ìpínlẹ̀ Èkó láti ìlú London lọ́jọ́ ìṣẹ́gun (Tuesday), láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ àwọn akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ fún ìgbáradì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ èyí tí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún yóò gbá pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù DR Congo.

english: The Super Eagles are expected to train this morning as the friendly with La Liga outfit Atlético de Madrid will take place at Godswill Akpabio International Stadium this evening, starting from 1800 hours.
yoruba: Ìrètí wà pé, ikọ̀ Super Eagles yóò gbáradì ní òwúrọ̀ òní fún ìfigagbága ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ mìíràn tí yóò wáyé láàrin ikọ̀ ọ̀hún àti ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Atletico de Madrid, tí ó ń kópa nínú ìdíje La Liga lórílẹ̀-èdè Spain, ní pápá ìṣeré Godswill Akpabio láago mẹ́fa ìrọ̀lẹ́ òní.

english: Speaking on the upcoming friendly against England, Ighalo said : ”England have a very good and fantastic team, we are not going to underrate them.
yoruba: Ighalo sọ̀rọ̀ ṣaájú ìfigagbága ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ tí wọn yóò gbá pẹ̀lú England, "England ní àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó dára púpọ̀, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, a  ò ní fojú tẹ́ńbẹ́lú wọn rárá.

english: ”I am looking forward to that game because I have played in the EPL before and I’ll like to see some familiar players on the pitch again.”
yoruba: "Mò ń fojú sọ́nà fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà torí pé, mo ti kópa rí nínú ìdíje ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì EPL, tí mo sì fẹ́ràn láti rí àwọn ojú tí a jọ wà tẹ́lẹ̀.

english: Iwobi signs up for LG ambassador
yoruba: Iwobi fẹnu ko pẹ̀lú ilé-iṣẹ́ LG láti jẹ́ aṣojú wọn.

english: LG Electronics has signed Super Eagles winger, Alex Iwobi as its official brand ambassador.
yoruba: Atamátàsé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles, Alex Iwobi ti bọwọ́ lu ìwé ìbásepọ̀ pẹ̀lú ilé-iṣẹ́ tó ń rí sí ìpèsè ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé LG Electronics, láti jẹ́ aṣojú ilé-iṣẹ́ náà.

english: Speaking at the unveiling, Managing Director, LG Electronics West Africa Operations, Taeick Son said: “the choice of Alex Iwobi went through a thorough process and in the end we zeroed in on him, going by his antecedent in the field of play and most importantly how he is generally perceived as a player around the globe,
yoruba: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí olùdarí ilé-iṣẹ́ LG Electronics nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà, Taeick Son ṣe sọ: Kí a tó yan Alex Iwobi gẹ́gẹ́ bí aṣojú wa, a fikùnlukùn lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ láti wo ipa rẹ̀ tí ó ń kó lórí pápá, àti ní pàápàá jùlọ bí àwọn ènìyàn ṣe nífẹ̀ẹ́ rẹ̀ sí jákèjádò.

english: Chelsea beats Manchester United to win FA Cup
yoruba: Chelsea fàgbà hàn Manchester United láti gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje FA Cup.

english: Chelsea beat Manchester United 1-0 to lift the FA Cup thanks to Eden Hazard’s penalty at Wembley on Saturday to salvage a disappointing season.
yoruba: Chelsea fàgbà han Manchester United láti gba ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje FA Cup, nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ tí ó wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré Wembley lọ́jọ́ Àìkú (Saturday).

english: Though the victory in the finals is not enough to confirm the team coach Antonio Conte mule, who is expected to take over from him after the games this season, due to the inconsistence of the teamand does not qualify for the UEFA championship league in the next seasonafter ending up in the fifth position on the EPL chat.
yoruba: Bí ó tilẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, jíjáwé olúborí nínú àṣekágbá ìdíje náà kò tíi tó láti fẹsẹ̀ àkọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ ọ̀hún, Antonio Conte múlẹ̀, lẹ́ni tí ìrètí wà pé wọn yóò gba iṣẹ́ lọ́wọ́ rẹ̀ tí sáà ìdíje yìí bá parí, látàrí àìṣe déédé ikọ̀ náà, tí wọn kò sì tún pegedé fún ìdíje UEFA champions league ti sáà tó ń bọ̀, lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n parí sípò karùn-ún lórí tábìlì ìdíje EPL.

english: Now loosing the trouphy  of the game into the hand of the Chelsea, shows that Manchester football team ended this season without any trouphy.
yoruba: Ní báyìí, pípàdánù ife-ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje FA ọ̀hún sọ́wọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Chelsea, ló fihàn pé, ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Manchester United parí sáà yìí láìgba ife-ẹ̀yẹ kankan.

english: According to the captain of the team, Gary Cahill we worked earnestly to win the trouphy to honor this season this year as a result of our consistency in all our different games we played.
yoruba: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí balógun ikọ̀ ọ̀hún, Gary Cahill ṣe sọ, A ṣisẹ́ takuntakun láti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ yìí, láti yẹ́ sáà wa tọdụ́n yìí sí, látàrí àìṣe déédé wa nínú ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan ìdíje yòókù tí a kópa nínú rẹ̀.

english: Romelu Lukaku who was the highest goal scored for Manchester United this season does not have the opportunity to take part in the competition from the beginningdue to the injury he sustained.
yoruba: "Romelu Lukaku tí ó jẹ́ ẹni tí ó gbá bọ́ọ̀lù ságbọ̀n júlọ̀ fún ikọ̀ Manchester United ni sáà yìí, kò láǹfààní láti bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà látàrí ìfarapa ráńpẹ́ tí ó ní.

english: Super Eagles need total support from Nigerians, NFF – Dalung
yoruba: Dalung- Super Eagles nílò àtìlẹyìn tí ó péye ṣaájú ìdíje àgbááyé.

english: Minister of Youth and Sport, Solomon Dalung has appealed to Nigerians to show solidarity and support to ensure the success of the Super Eagles at the FIFA World Cup in Russia
yoruba: Mínísítà tó ń rí sí ọ̀rọ̀ ere ìdárayá àti ìdàgbàsókè àwọn ọ̀dọ́ ní Nàìjííríà, ọ̀gbẹ́ni Solomon Dalung ti pè fún àtìlẹyìn tí ò lẹ́gbẹ́ látọwọ́ àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà fún àṣeyọrí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles ṣaájú ìdíje àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.

english: Dalung in a statement issued on Thursday in Abuja by his Special Assistant, Media, Nneka Ikem-Anibeze, thanked the team for their commitment, patriotism and unity of purpose as the World Cup approaches.
yoruba: Dalung sọ nínú ọ̀rọ̀ rẹ̀ eléyìí tí amúgbálẹ́gbẹ̀ẹ́ pàtàkì rẹ̀ lóri ́ọ̀rọ̀ ìgbódegbà àti ìfitónilétí, Nneka Ikem-Anibeze, gbé jáde lọ́jọ́bọ (Thursday) nílùú Abuja, Ó gbóríyìn fún ikọ̀ ọ̀hún fún gbogbo akitiyan wọn, ìbáṣepọ̀ àti ìwà akínkanjú tí wọ́n ní ṣaájú ìdíje náà tó ń ti ń sún mọ́lé báyìí.

english: He urged the team and other stakeholders to continue to produce the desired results in their friendly games and aspire to win the cup.
yoruba: Ó wá rọ, àpapọ̀ ikọ̀ ọ̀hún àti àwọn tọ́rọ̀ kàn nínú ikọ̀ náà pé, kí wọ́n ríi dájú láti kópa dáradára nínú ọ̀kan-ò-jọkan ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ wọn tí wọn yóò gbá fún ìgbáradì ní kíkún ṣaájú ìdíje ńlá náà.

english: “I sincerely commend the Federal Government and Nigerians for their unflinching support and solidarity to the team and officials.
yoruba: Mo gbósùbà káreláí fún ìjọba àpapọ̀ látàrí àtìlẹyìn wọn lọ́lọ́kan-ò-jọ̀kan fún ikọ̀ yìí.

english: The government assured Nigerians to do the needful before the friendly competitions to be played withDR Congo, England and Czech Republic.
yoruba: Ìjọba fi dá àwọn ọmọ orílẹ̀-èdè lójú láti ṣètò bí ó ti tọ́ àti bí ó ti yẹ ṣaájú àwọn ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ wa yòókù tí a ó gbá pẹ̀lú, DR Congo, England àti Czech Republic.

english: Also the Minister commended NFF, the workers and the coaches for their efforts then he appealed to them to unit their heart for the training.
yoruba: Bákan náà, mínísítà tuń kí àjọ NFF, àwọn òṣìṣẹ́ tí ó fi mọ́ àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá gbogbo fún akitiyan wọn, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, Ó rọ̀ wọ́n láti pa ọkàn wọn pọ̀ sójúkan fún ìgbáradì ìdíje náà.

english: DR Congo releases 28-man list for Nigeria friendly
yoruba: DR Congo kéde agbábọ́ọ̀lù méjídínlọ́gbọ̀n tí yóò kojú Super Eagles.

english: Nigeria retains 47 position in FIFA ranking
yoruba: Nàìjíríà dípò mẹ́tàdínláàdọ́ta mú nínú ipò àtẹ àjọ FIFA.

english: As projected, Nigeria has retained her 47th position in the latest FIFA rankings
yoruba: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí àbájáde ipò àtẹ àjọ FIFA tí ó jáde lọ́jọ́bọ (Thursday), Nàìjíiríà dipò mẹ́tàdínláàdọ́ta mú lágbàáyé nínú ipò àtẹ àjọ ọ̀hún tí ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ jáde.

english: The rankings released on FIFA website on Thursday recorded few changes as the first 47 countries retained their previous positions.
yoruba: Ipò àtẹ ọ̀hún ni àjọ FIFA gbé jáde lórí ẹ̀rọ ayélujára wọn lọ́jọ́bọ (Thursday), eléyìí tí orílẹ̀-èdè mẹ́tàdínláàdọ́ta di ipò wọn mú gẹ́gẹ́ bí wọ́n ṣe wà tẹ́lẹ̀.

english: Germany, Brazil and Belgium were on the top three positions, while Super Eagles world cup foes Argentina, Croatia and Iceland were on fifth, 18th and 22nd positions.
yoruba: Orílẹ̀-èdè Germany, Brazil àti Belgium wà lórí òkè téńté tábìlì ọ̀hún ní ìtẹ̀léǹtẹ̀lé, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni Argentina, Croatia àti Iceland wà ní ipò karùn-ún, ipò kejìdínlógún àti ipò kejìlélógún.

english: The next rankings would be released on June 7.
yoruba: Ipò àtẹ mìíràn yóò tún jáde lọ́jọ́ keje oṣù kẹfà ọdún tí a wà yìí.

english: Oborududu joins team Nigeria in New York
yoruba: Oborududu yóò dara pọ̀ mọ́ àwọn akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ ní New York.

english: Nigeria’s Blessing Oborududu (68kg) has arrived in New York to join her teammates for the “Beat The Streets Invitational Wrestling Tournament’’ beginning on May 17.
yoruba: Blessing Oborududu tí ó ní òṣùwọ̀n kílógíràmù méjìdínláàádọ́rin (68kg), ti balẹ̀ sílùú New York láti dara pọ̀ mọ́ àwọn akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ yòókù fún ìdíje ìfigagbága tí yóò wáyé lọ́jọ́ kẹtàdínlógún oṣù karùn-ún ọdún tí a wà yìí.

english: Oborududu was unable to travel on Sunday with her teammates due to visa problems.
yoruba: Oborududu kò láǹfààní láti bá àwọn akẹẹgbẹ́ rẹ̀ lọ lọ́jọ́ Àìkú (Sunday), látàrí ìdojúkọ ìwé ìrìn àjò tí ò ní.

english: She joined Odunayo Adekuoroye (57kg) and Aminat Adeniyi (62kg) for the competition that will hold at the popular Times Square, New York.
yoruba: Ó dara pọ̀ mọ Ọdúnayọ Adékúoróyè tí ó ní òṣùwọ̀n kílógírámù mẹ́tàdínlọ́gọ́ta (57kg) àti Aminat Adéníyì tí ó ní òṣùwọ̀n kìlógírámù méjílélọ́gọ́ta (62kg), fún ìfigagbága tí yóò wáyé ní gbàgede

english: Speaking from New York, Purity Akuh, the wrestlers’ coach to the competition, said he was happy to finally have his full team on ground.
yoruba: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Purity Akuh, tí ó jẹ àkọ́nimọ̀ọ́jà ikọ̀ náà,"Inú mi dùn púpọ̀ pé, ikọ̀ mi ti pé báyìí.

english: “I’m looking forward for the World Championships in Hungary later this year, and this tournament will also serve as preparation.
yoruba: Mo ń fojú sọ́nà fún ìdíje World Championships tí yóò wáyé lórílẹ̀-èdè Hungary, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ìfigagbága yìí yóò ṣe àǹfààní fún wa láti fi gbáradì ṣaájú ìdíje àgbááyé ọ̀hún.

english: Atletico flogs Marseille 3-0 to win third Europa cup
yoruba: Atletico fàgbà han Marseille pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́ta sóódo.

english: Atletico Madrid striker Antoine Griezmann struck twice as they beat hapless Olympique de Marseille 3-0 on Wednesday to win the Europa League for the third time.
yoruba: Atamátàsé agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ iwájú fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Atletico Madrid, Antoine Griezmann ti ran ikọ̀ rẹ̀ lọ́wọ́ láti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje Europa League fún ìgbà kẹta báyìí, lẹ́yìn tí wọ́n fàgbà han ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Olympique de Marseille pẹ̀lú àmì-ayò mẹ́ta sóódo (3-0), lọ́jọ́rú (Wednesday).

english: Marseille dominated the opening stages but gifted Atletico the lead when Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa failed to control goalkeeper Steve Mandanda’s pass out and Gabi intercepted before setting Griezmann free to score in the 21st minute.
yoruba: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, àmì-ayò kínni wáyé látàrí àṣìṣe agbábọ́ọ̀lù ẹ̀yìn Marseille Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa, eléyìí tí balógun ikọ̀ Madrid, Gabi já gbà kí ó tó ṣè ìrànwọ́ àmì-ayò ọ̀hún fún Griezmann ní ìṣẹ́jú kọkànlélógún sáà àkọ́kọ́ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà.

english: Marseille had wasted a chance to take a fourth-minute lead when Valere Germain skewed his shot wide with only Jan Oblak to beat and it got worse for them when playmaker Dimitri Payet left the field injured in floods of tears in the 32nd minute.
yoruba: Marseille pàdánù àǹfàaní lóríṣiriṣi láti dá àmì-ayò náà padà, ṣùgbọ́n ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà tún wá burú jáì lẹ́yìn tí agbábọ́ọ̀lù àárín ikọ̀ náà, Dimitri Payet fara pa, tí ó sì jáde níṣẹ̀ẹ́jú kọkànlélọ́gbọ̀n sáà kínní ọ̀hún.

english: Four minutes after the re-start, Koke assisted Griezmann to score a goal.
yoruba: Ní ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́rin gbàrà tí sáà kejì bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀, Koke tún ṣe ìrànwọ́ àmì-ayò mìíràn fún Griezmann.

english: Gabi added a late third goal and the final score was 3-0
yoruba: Gabi gbá àmì ayò mìíràn wọ̀lé láti sọ àpapọ̀ èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún di mẹ́ta sóódo (3-0).

english: Brazil names provisional 23-man squad
yoruba: Brazil kéde agbábọ́ọ̀lu mẹ́tàlélógún fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé.

english: Rohr announced a 30-man list of footballers for the World cup
yoruba: Rohr kéde ọgbọ̀n agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí yóò kópa fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé.

english: Nigeria Coach Gernot Rohr has announced the country’s provisional squad for the upcoming FIFA World Cup in Russia.
yoruba: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles, Gernot Rohr ti kéde àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí yóò lọ ṣojú orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà nínú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.

english: Nigeria face Argentina, Turkey in FIBA World Cup
yoruba: Nàìjííríà yóò kojú Argentina, Turkey nínú ìdíje àgbááyé FIBA.

english: Nigeria have been drawn against Australia, Argentina and Turkey in Group B  of  the 2018 FIBA Women’s Basketball World Cup from September 22 to 30 in Tenerife, Spain.
yoruba: Nàìjíírìà yóò máa kojú ikọ̀ Australia, Argentina àti Turkey nínú ìpele kejì ìyíkoto ìfigágbaga ìdíje àgbááyé 2018 FIBA Women Basketball tí yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ kejìlélógún oṣù kẹsàn-án títí di ọgbọ̀n ọjọ́ ọdún tí a wà yìí, nílùú Tenerife, lórílẹ̀-èdè Spain.

english: Australia are ranked fourth in the latest FIBA rankings while Turkey are seventh and Argentina are 15th in the world.
yoruba: Australia dipò kẹrin mú nínú ipò àtẹ àjọ FIBA tí ó ṣẹ̀ṣẹ̀ jáde, Turkey wà ní ipò keje, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni Argentina dipò karùndínlógún mú lágbàáyé.

english: Coach Sam Vincent’s D’Tigress are currently ranked 37th in the world and fifth in Africa.
yoruba: Ikọ̀ Tigress wà ní ipò mẹ́tàdínlógójì lágbàáyé, tí wọ́n sì di ipò karùn-ún mú nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà.

english: Senegal  were drawn in  Group D  alongside Latvia, the USA and China.
yoruba: Senegal bọ́ sí ìpele kẹrin, tí wọn yóò sì máa kojú Latvia, USA àti China.

english: Nigeria qualified for their first World Cup in 2006 but failed to win any game at the competition. They were eliminated from the group stage.
yoruba: Nàìjííríà pegedé fún ìdíje àgbáyé FIBA fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ lọ́dún 2006, ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò jáwé olúborí nínú ìfigagbága kankan tí wọ́n fi já kúrò nínú ìdíje ọ̀hún.

english: Meanwhile, the Nigeria Basketball Federation on Sunday said the team would camp in Atlanta, Georgia, USA for their World Cup preparations.
yoruba: Bákan náà, gẹ́gẹ́ bí àjọ NBF (Nigeria Basketball Federation), wọ́n ní, ikọ̀ Tigress yóò pàgọ́ sílùú Atlanta, Georgia, lórilẹ̀-èdè USA fún ìgbáradì ìdíje náà ní kíkún.

english: The federation in a statement by their  spokesman Afolabi Oni  said  they  would release a provisional list of invited players for the competition after the Russia 2018 World Cup.
yoruba: Agbẹnusọ̀rọ̀ àjọ ọ̀hún, ọ̀gbẹ́ni Afọlábí Òní sọ pé, wọn yóò kéde àpapọ̀ ikọ̀ tí yóò máa kópa fún ìdíje ọ̀hún ní kété tí ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé Russia 2018 bá parí.

english: Roberto Mancini quits Zenit as the Club Manager
yoruba: Mancini fiṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Zenit.

english: Manager Roberto Mancini has agreed to leave Zenit St Petersburg by mutual consent.
yoruba: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Zenit St Petersburg, Roberto Mancini ti gbà láti fiṣẹ́ sílẹ̀ lẹ́yìn tí ó fẹnu kò pẹ̀lú àdéhùn tí ó rọ̀ mọ́ ìfisẹ́ sílẹ̀ náà.

english: The 53-year-old has been heavily linked with the vacant manager’s job of the Italian national team.
yoruba: Ọmọ ọdún mẹ́tàlélógójì ọ̀hún ni ìrètí wà pé yóò bẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ láìpẹ́ gẹ́gẹ́ bí akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Italy.

english: Former Manchester City and Inter Milan boss Mancini took charge of Zenit in June 2017, and they are fifth in the Russian Premier League.
yoruba: Bákan náà, Ó tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Manchester City, Inter Milan, kí ó tó dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Zenit lọ́dún 2017, tí ó sì ran ikọ̀ ọ̀hún lọ́wọ́ láti parí ìdíje sáà yìí sípò karùn-ún lórí tábìlì.

english: Zenit and Roberto Mancini agree to an early end to the manager’s contract,.
yoruba: Zenit àti Roberto Mancini fẹnu kò láti fòpin sí ìbáṣepọ̀ wọn.

english: The contract will be terminated by mutual consent without any compensation payable.
yoruba: Ní báyìí, Mancini yóò kúrò nínú ikọ̀ ọ̀hún láìgba owó gbàmábìínú kankan.

english: Edmund stuns Djokovic in Madrid open
yoruba: Edmund fàgbà han Djokovic nínú ìdíje Madrid open.

english: Kyle Edmund enjoyed one of the biggest triumphs of his career by defeating former world number one Novak Djokovic 6-3, 2-6, and 6-3 in the second round of the Madrid Open.
yoruba: Kyle Edmund gbádùn ọkàn lára ìfigagbága rẹ̀ tí ó ti ń gbá láti ìgbà tí ó ti ń díje nínú eré ìdárayá bọ́ọ̀lù àfigigbá, lẹ́yìn tí ó fàgbà han òǹdíje tí ó dára jùlọ tẹ́lẹ̀rí nínú eré ìdárayá ọ̀hún, Novak Djokovic nínú ìfigagbága ìsọ̀rí-ìsọ̀rí pẹ̀lú àmì ayò mẹ́fà sí mẹ́ta (6-3), méjì sí mẹ́fà (2-6) àti mẹ́fa sí mẹ́ta (6-3) nínú ìpele kejì ìdíje Madrid Open.

english: Tiger Woods to feature in British open
yoruba: Tiger Woods yóò kópa nínú ìdíje British open.

english: Former world number one Tiger Woods has confirmed his entry for the 147th British Open at Carnoustie, the tournament organisers announced on Wednesday.
yoruba: Tiger Woods ti sọ pé, òun yóò kópa nínú ìdíje mẹ́tàdínláàdọ́jọ British Open tí ìgbìmọ̀ náà yóò ṣagbátẹrù rẹ̀, eléyìí tí yóò wáyé ní gbàgede Carnoustie lọ́jọ́rú.

english: Wood, the 42-year-old has lifted the Claret Jug three times in his career but has not contested the sport’s oldest major championship since 2015 due to injury.
yoruba: Woods, ọmọ ọdún méjílélógójì náà, ẹni ti ó ti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje ọ̀hún fún ìgbà mẹ́ta ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀, ṣùgbọ́n kò tíì láǹfààní láti kópa nínú ìdíje náà láti ọdún 2015 látàrí ìfarapa tí ó ní.

english: Woods, a 14-time Major champion, has played seven times this year on his comeback after a successful spinal fusion operation last April.
yoruba: Bákan náà, Woods tí gba ife ẹ̀yẹ mẹ́rìnlá ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, Ó tún kópa nínú ìfigagbága méje ọ̀tọ̀ọ̀tọ̀ lọ́dún yìí, lẹ́yìn àṣeyọrí iṣẹ́ abẹ́ ọ̀pá ẹ̀yìn èyí tí ó làkọjá nínú oṣù kẹrin ọdún tí ó kọjá.

english: The British Open will be played from July 19 to July 22.
yoruba: Ní ìparí, ìdíje British Open náà yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ lọ́jọ́ kọkàndínlógún, oṣù keje títí di ọjọ́ kejìlélógún oṣù kan nàà ọdún tí a wà yìí (July 19 to July 22).

english: AC Milan goalkeeper Gianluigi's blunder made them loss the match
yoruba: Àṣìṣe aṣọ́lé ikọ̀ Ac Milan, Gianluigi ṣokùnfà bí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún ṣe pàdánù.

english: A double blunder by Ac Milan goalie goalkeeper Gianluigi Donnarumma ensured that Juventus won the Coppa Italia on Thursday.
yoruba: Àṣìṣe aṣọ́lé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Ac Milan Gianluigi Donnarumma ti ṣokùnfà bí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún ṣe pàdánù ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ àṣekágbá ìdíje Coppa Italia sọ́wọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Juventus nínú ìfigagbága tí ó wáyé lọ́jọ́bọ (Thursday).

english: Central defender Medhi Benatia struck twice for Juventus and Douglas Costa scored another goal.
yoruba: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́̀ ẹ̀yìn Juventus Medhi Benatia, gbá àmì ayò méjì wọlé, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni  Douglas Costa gbá àmì ayò mìíràn wọlé.

english: An own goal by substitute Nikola Kalinic made them to lose 4-0
yoruba: Nikola Kalinic ṣe àṣìṣe gbá àmì ayò kan mìíràn wọnú agbọ̀n rẹ̀, láti sọ àpapọ̀ èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà di àmì ayò mérin sóódó.

english: Dennerby, the Super Falcons coach lists 26 for Gambia
yoruba: Dennerby kéde agbábọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́rìndínlọ́gbọ̀n tí yóò kojú Gambia.

english: The Super Falcons return to camp on Thursday ahead of  their 2018 Women’s  Africa Cup of Nations qualifier  against  Gambia.
yoruba: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Falcons yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ ìgbáradì ní kíkún fún ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìpegedé ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù ilẹ̀ Áfíríkà 2018 táwọn obìnrin tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà, eléyìí tí wọn yóò gbá pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Gambia.

english: And Nigeria coach Thomas Dennerby has  invited  26 players, including overseas-based players.
yoruba: Ní báyìí, akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ ọ̀hún, Thomas Dennerby ti pe agbábọ́ọ̀lù mẹ́rìndínlọ́gbọ́n, tí ó fi mọ́ àwọn tí ó fi ilẹ̀ òkèrè ṣe ibùgbé.

english: Ribery extends contract with Bayern Munich
yoruba: Ribery sún àsìko rẹ̀ síwájú sí nínu ikọ̀ agbabọ́ọ̀lù Bayern Munich.

english: Bayern Munich winger Franck Ribery has signed a one-year contract extension until the end of next season.
yoruba: Atamátàsé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Bayern Munich, Franck Ribery ti sún àsìkò rẹ̀ síwájú síi nínú lkọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Bayern lẹ́yìn tí ó bọwọ́lu ìwé ìṣiṣẹ́ pọ̀ ọlọ́dún kan.

english: The 35-year-old, who was out of contract at the end of the season, scored five goals in 19 appearances to win his eighth Bundesliga title with Bayern.
yoruba: Ọmọ ọdún márùnlélọ́gbọ̀n ọ̀hún ní àmì ayò márùn-ún péré nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ mọ́kàndínlógún tí ó gbá ní sáà yìí láti gba ife ẹ̀yẹ kẹjọ ìdíje Bundesliga.

english: “We’re very pleased that Franck is staying with us,” Bayern sporting director Hasan Salihamidzic said in a statement.
yoruba: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí adarí ẹ̀ka ètò ìdárayá fún Bayern, Hasan Salihamidzic ṣe sọ, Inú wa dùn púpọ̀ pé Franck ṣì fẹ́ dúró tìwá.

english: Ribery joined Bayern Club since moving from Olympique de Marseille in 2007.
yoruba: "Ẹ̀wẹ̀, Ribery dara pọ̀ mọ́ ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Bayern lọ́dún 2007 láti ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Olympique de Marseille.

english: “I’m very happy that I’ll get to play for this great club for another year,” he said,
yoruba: Ribery sọ pé, inú mi dùn pé máa tún kópa fún ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù yìí fún sáà kan sí i,

english: “Munich has long since become home for me and my family and I’m therefore very proud”
yoruba: Munich ti jẹ́ ilé fún èmi àti ẹbí mi láti ọjọ́ pípẹ́, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni ó jẹ́ ìwúrí fún mi.

english: Eagles ready for World Cup – Balogun
yoruba: Eagles ṣetán fún ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé – Balogun

english: Nigeria defender Leon Balogun says it is crucial his fellow  Super Eagles  team-mates stay injury-free ahead of the 2018 World Cup.
yoruba: Atamátàsé agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yìn ikọ̀ Super Eagles, Leon Balógun sọ pé, ó jẹ́ ohun ìwúrí pé àwọn akẹẹgbẹ́ òun kò ní ìfarapa kankan ṣááju ìdíje àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà.

english: Nigeria, the first side from Africa to seal a spot in Russia, have been drawn in Group D alongside Argentina, Croatia and Iceland.
yoruba: Nínú ìdíje àgbááyé náà, eléyìí tí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles jẹ́ ikọ̀ kínní tí ó kọ́kọ́ pegedé fún ìdíje ọ̀hún nílẹ̀ Áfíríkà, ni wọn yóò máa wàákò pẹ̀lú Argentina, Croatia àti Iceland.

english: Balogun says the fitness of players will be key to having a successful campaign this summer.
yoruba: Balógun wa sọ pé, kí okun àwọn agbábọ́ọ̀lù pé yóò ran ikọ̀ náà lọ́wọ́ púpọ̀ láti ṣàṣeyọrí nínú ìdíje àgbááyé ọ̀hún.

english: “We have a team capable of doing well in Russia and this team can perform to expectations if we have everyone in great shape,.
yoruba: A ní ikọ̀ tí o le fakọyọ ní Russia, bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni a lè dé ìpele tí ó lápẹrẹ tí a bá ní okun àti ìlera tí ó pé.

english: I know injuries come with football and if we are very lucky not have it, then all the players in Nigerian colours have the spirit to fight for success until the end.” He said.
yoruba: Mo mọ̀ pé, ìfarapa máa ń wáyé nípasẹ̀ kíkópa lórí pápá, tí a bá sì ní oreọ̀fẹ́ láti má nìí ìfarapa kankan tí ìdíje náà yóó fi bẹ̀rẹ̀, èyí yóò ṣe ìrànwọ́ fún wa lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀.

english: At their last appearance, the experienced Super Eagles led by Joseph Yobo and Vincent Enyeama reached the second round in Brazil before losing to France, and Balogun says the current team is focussed on success.
yoruba: "Nínú irúfẹ́ ìdíje ọ̀hún tí ó wáyé sị̀kẹyìn, eléyìí tí balogun ikọ̀ náà tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Joseph Yobo àti Vincent Enyeama tukọ̀ rẹ̀, ikọ̀ ọ̀hún dé ìpele kejì nínú ìdíje ni Brazil kí ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù France kó tó já wọn kúro.

english: World Cup-bound England will be Nigeria’s opponents on June 2  at Wembley ahead of the final warm-up fixture against Czech Republic on June  6.
yoruba: Bákan náà, ni ikọ̀ Super Eagles yóò tún kojú England lọ́jọ́ kejí oṣù kẹfà ọdún tí a wà yìí, ní pápá ìṣeré Wembley ṣaájú ìfigagbága ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ kẹyìn pẹ̀lú Czech Republic lọ́jọ́ kẹfà sí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún.

english: The result of the football competitions in Nigeria (NPFL).
yoruba: Èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà (NPFL).

english: This is the result of the Nigeria Professional Football League (NPFL) which came up last weekend:
yoruba: Èyí ni èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá orílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà Nigeria Professional Football League (NPFL), tí ó wáyé lópin ọ̀sẹ̀:

english: Super Eagles will excel at Russia 2018 – Yobo
yoruba: Super Eagles yóò fakọyọ lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia – Yobo

english: Nigeria’s ex-international, Joseph Yobo, says he believes the current squad of the Super Eagles will excel in the forthcoming FIFA World Cup in Russia.
yoruba: Balógun ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles tẹ́lẹ̀ rí, Joseph Yobo, sọ pé, òun ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé ikọ̀ Super Eagles yóò fakọyọ nínú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbááyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.

english: Yobo said the team should not be intimidated by others in their group — Croatia, Argentina and Iceland.
yoruba: Yobo gba ikọ̀ ọ̀hún níyànjú láti má ṣe jáyà fún ikọ̀ akẹẹgbẹ́ wọn kankan tí wọn yóò jọ máa figagbága, tí ń ṣe Croatia, Argentina àti Iceland.

english: The former defender, Yobo commended the effort of the Coach, Gernot Rohr, in bringing together gifted players to fight for jerseys ahead of the mundial.
yoruba: Agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọwọ́ ẹ̀yìn náà tẹ́lẹ̀rí, Yobo gbóríyìn fún akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ ọ̀hún, Gernot Rohr, fún akitiyan rẹ tí ó sà láti kó ọ̀kan-ò-jọ̀kan agbábọ́ọ̀lu tí ó dáńtọ́ jọ láti figagbága fún ààyè ṣaájú ìdíje ọ̀hún.

english: Yobo said he was of the opinion that the challenge in the goalkeeping aspect would be overcome and the team would do the nation proud in Russia.
yoruba: Yobo wá yànàná ìdojúkọ tí ikọ̀ ọ̀hún kojú ní ẹ̀ka agbábọ́ọ̀lù aṣólé, pé ikọ̀ náà yóò la ìdojúkọ ọ̀hún kọjá tí wọn yóò sì fakọyọ lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.

english: “I believe the current squad of the Super Eagles would excel in Russia,” Yobo said.
yoruba: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Yobo ṣe sọ, Mo ní ìgbàgbọ́ pé ikọ̀ Super Eagles yìí yóò fakọyọ lórílẹ̀-èdè Russia.

english: He noted that with the team having a rich blend of youth and experience
yoruba: Ó fikún un pé, agbábọ́ọ̀lù ọ̀dọ́ tí ó pọ̀ nínú ikọ̀ náà yóò ran ikọ̀ náà lọ́wọ́ lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ nínú ìdíje náà.

english: Roberto Mancini has agreed to become new Italy coach
yoruba: Roberto Mancini fẹnu kò pẹ̀lú àjọ FA láti tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè Italy.

english: Roberto Mancini has reached an agreement to become the next Italy coach, according to multiple media reports on Tuesday.
yoruba: Roberto Mancini ti fẹnu kò pẹ̀lú àjọ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá orílẹ̀-èdè Italy láti jẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè ọ̀hún.

english: The Zenit St Petersburg manager met with the Italian FA sub-commissioner Alessandro Costacurta and team manager Gabriele Oriali for over two hours in Rome on Monday evening.
yoruba: Akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Zenit St Petersburg náà, ṣe ìpàdé pọ̀ pẹ̀lú aṣojú àjọ FA orílẹ̀-èdè Italy, Alessandro Costacurta àti olùdarí àgbà ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù náà, Gabriele Oriali fún wákàtí méjì gbáko nílùú Rome nírọ̀lẹ́ ọjọ́ Ajé.

english: Gazzetta News agency said the federation had offered the former Manchester City manager a two-year contract until 2020 worth four million euros ($4.8million) a year.
yoruba: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí ilé-iṣẹ́ akọ̀ròyìn Gazzetta,"Mancini bọwọ́ lu ìwé láti ṣe iṣẹ́ ọlọ́dún méjì, èyí tí yóò mú un wà nínú ikọ̀ ọ̀hún títí di ọdún 2020, tí yóò sì máa gba mílíọ́nù mẹ́rin owó ilẹ̀ òkèrè euro lọ́dọọdún.

english: “Coaching the national team would be prestigious and a source of pride for me because Italy are one of the most important teams in the world,” Mancini said.
yoruba: "Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Mancini ṣe sọ, ó jẹ́ ohun ìwúrí fún mi lọ́pọ̀lọpọ̀ láti jẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ọ̀kan lára ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù orílẹ̀-èdè tí ó lààmìlaaka jùlọ nínú eré bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lágbàáyé,"

english: Mancini is expected to take over the national team after the final round of Russian domestic fixtures on May 13 and before the May 20 deadline set by the Italian FA.
yoruba: Ní báyìí, ìrètí wà pé, Mancini yóò bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀ iṣẹ́ rẹ̀ ní kété tí ìdíje orílẹ̀-èdè Russia bá parí ní ọjọ́ kẹtàlá oṣù karùn-ún ọdún tí a wà yìí.

english: During his 17-year coaching career Mancini led Manchester City to their first English title in 44 years in 2012.
yoruba: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, fún gbogbo sáà ọdún mẹ́tàdínlógún tí Mancini ti yan iṣẹ́ akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá láàyò, Ó tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Manchester City gba ife ẹ̀yẹ́ ìdíje ilẹ̀ Gẹ̀ẹ́sì EPL fún ìgbà àkọ́kọ́ lọ́dún mẹ́rìnlélógójì ní ọdún 2012.

english: He also won three Serie A titles with Inter Milan and Italian Cups with Inter, Fiorentina and Lazio.
yoruba: Bẹ́ẹ̀ sì ni, Ó tún gba ife ẹ̀yẹ ìdíje Serie A mẹ́ta pẹ̀lú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Inter Milan, tí ó sì tún tukọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Fiorentina àti   Lazio.

english: Among the other names being touted for the position are Antonio Conte and Claudio Ranieri.
yoruba: Lára àwọn akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá mìíran tí wọ́n rò pé wọ́n kójú òṣùwọ̀n láti tukọ̀ ọ̀hún ni: Antonio Conte àti Claudio Ranieri.

english: Real Madrid sneak into third straight champions league final
yoruba: Real Madrid pegedé sínú àṣekágbá ìdíje UEFA champions league.

english: Real Madrid have qualified for their third consecutive UEFA champions league final, but only just.
yoruba: Ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lu Real Madrid ti pegedé sínú aṣekágbá ìdíje UEFA champions league fún ìgbà kẹta léra wọn báyìí.

english: The European champions held German side FC Bayern Munich to a 2-2 draw, but sneaked through 4-3 on aggregate.
yoruba: Èsì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún parí sí àmì-ayò méjì-méjì (2-2), tí àpapọ̀ àmì ayò náà sì jẹ́ àmì ayò mẹ́rin sí mẹ́ta (4-3).

english: Joshua Kimmich gave Bayern a third minute lead, but Los Merengues responded through Karim Benzema who headed in the equalizer eight minutes later.
yoruba: Joshua Kimmich ló gbá àmì ayò kínní wọlé, tí Karim Benzema sì dá àmì- ayò ọ̀hún padà ní ìṣẹ́jú mẹ́jọ sí àmì ayò àkọ́kọ́.

english: Barely after resumption of the second half, Bayern keeper Sven Ulreich’s huge error ultimately proved decisive as his failure to clear a lose pass allowed Benzema to extend the Madrid side’s lead to two points.
yoruba: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ní kété tí sáà kejì ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún bẹ̀ẹ̀rẹ̀, àṣìṣe aṣọ́lé ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Bayern, Sven Ulreich ni ó ṣokùnfà bí Benzema tún ṣe gbá àmì-ayò kejì wọlé.

english: James Rodriguez raised hopes with a close-range finish to tie the match at 2-2.
yoruba: Bí ó ti lẹ̀ jẹ́ pé, James Rodriguez gbá àmì ayò mìíràn wọ̀lé, ṣùgbọ́n omi pọ̀ju ọkà lọ.

english: Real Madrid will meet the winner of the AS Roma or Liverpool clash, which will be played at the Stadio Olympico on Wednesday in Rome.
yoruba: Ní báyìí, Real Madrid yóò kojú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù tí ó bá jáwé olúborí nínú ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù AS Roma tabi Liverpool, èyí tí yóò wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré Stadio Olympico nílùú Rome ní àṣálẹ́ ọjọ́rú.

english: VAR to be used for England, Nigeria friendly- Pinnick
yoruba: Wọn yóò ṣàmúlò ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé VAR nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ Nàìjííríà àti England - Pinnick

english: President of the Nigeria Football Federation (NFF) Amaju Pinnick, has announced that the Video Assistant Referee (VAR) will be used during next month’s high profile pre-World Cup friendly against England at Wembley.
yoruba: Ààrẹ àjọ tó ń rí sí bọ́ọ̀lù àfẹsẹ̀gbá lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà, Amájù Pinnick, ti kéde pé, wọ́n yóò ṣàmúlò ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé Fọ́ńrán tí a mọ̀ sí, Video Assistant Referee (VAR) nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ tí yóò wáyé láàrin ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles àti orílẹ̀-èdè England lọ́sẹ̀ tó ń bọ̀ ní pápá ìṣeré Wembley.

english: The football match will take place on June 2 in a warm-up game ahead of the World Cup in Russia.
yoruba: Ẹ̀wẹ̀, ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún yóò wáyé lọ́jọ́ kejì oṣù kẹfà ọdún tí a wà yìí, fún ìgbáradì ní kíkún ṣaájú ìdíje bọ́ọ̀lù àgbáyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́nà.

english: “VAR will be used for our friendly against England, Pinnick said.
yoruba: Gẹ́gẹ́ bí Pinnick ṣe sọ, Wọn yóò ṣàmúlò ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé VAR nínú ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ wa pẹ̀lú orílẹ̀-èdè England.

english: Eagles Coach Gernot Rohr has also backed VAR, saying it will make refereeing fairer.
yoruba: "Bákan náà, akọ́nimọ̀ọ́gbá àgbà ikọ̀ ọ̀hún, Gernot Rohr náà bọwọ́lù ṣíṣe àmúlò ẹ̀rọ ìgbàlódé ọ̀hún pé, yóò ṣàtìlẹyìn ńlá fún olùdarí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà.

english: Dalung wants Eagles to play the football match with DR Congo in Abuja
yoruba: Dalung fẹ́ kí ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀¸ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ Eagles àti DR Congo wáyé nílùú Abuja.

english: Nigeria’s Minister of Youth and Sports, Solomon Dalung, has insisted that the international friendly match between the Super Eagles and Congo DR in May can only be played outside Abuja if National Stadium is not ready.
yoruba: Mínísítà tó ń rí sí eré ìdárayá àti ìdàgbàsókè àwọn ọ̀dọ́ lórílẹ̀-èdè Nàìjííríà, Solomon Dalung, ti fi múlẹ̀ pé, ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọlọ́rẹ̀ẹ́jọ̀rẹ́ tí yóò wáyé láàrin ikọ̀ agbábọ́ọ̀lù Super Eagles àti Congo DR yóò wáyé ní pápá ìṣeré mìíràn, tí àtúnṣe tó ń lọ lọ́wọ́ ní pápá ìṣeré ìlú Abuja kò bá tíi wá sí ìparí kí ó tó di àsìkò ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ náà.

english: Dalung was speaking with media after the opening ceremony of grassroots sports festival in Abuja on Monday.
yoruba: Dalung sọ ọ̀rọ̀ náà di mímọ̀ lásìkò tó ń bá àwọn akòròyìn sọ̀rọ̀, lẹ́yìn ayẹyẹ ìṣíṣọ lójú eégún ìdíje eré ìdárayá abẹ́lé tí yóò wáyé nílùú Abuja lọ́jọ́ Ajé.

english: Dalung said the idea to play the match in Abuja was to bid the team farewell to the World Cup in Russia and probably convince President Muhammadu Buhari to attend.
yoruba: Dalung fikún un pé, ìdí pàtàkì tí òun ṣe fẹ́ jẹ́ kí, ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún kó wáyé nílùú Abuja, ni láti fi yẹ́ ikọ̀ Super Eagles sí, ṣaájú ìrìn àjò ikọ̀ ọ̀hún lọ sí orílẹ̀-èdè Russia fún ìdíje àgbáyé tó ń bọ̀ lọ́na, àti pé bóyá ààrẹ Muhammadu Buhari yóò wá yẹ́ ìfẹsẹ̀wọnsẹ̀ ọ̀hún sí.

english: “We are looking at Port Harcourt if by then we are unable to complete work at the stadium here in Abuja.
